pli-tv-kd13:1.1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-kd13:1.1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-kd13:1.1.1.comm: This Chapter concerns the processes for the clearing of offenses entailing suspension. Vmv 4.134: Saṅghādisesānaṁ parivāsadānādisabbavinicchayassa samuccayattā panesa samuccayakkhandhakoti vuttoti veditabbo, “It is to be understood that because of the collection of all the explanations of the giving of probation, etc., for offenses entailing suspension, it is said Samuccayakkhandhaka.” Samuccayakkhandhaka literally means The Chapter on Accumulation.

pli-tv-kd13:1.1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā udāyī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno hoti sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:1.1.2.eng: At that time Venerable Udāyī had committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:1.1.3.eng: He told the monks about this,

pli-tv-kd13:1.1.4.pli: “ahaṃ, āvuso, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.

pli-tv-kd13:1.1.7.pli: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ detu.
pli-tv-kd13:1.1.7.eng: “Well then, the Sangha should give the monk Udāyī the trial period of six days for one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:1.2.1.eng: And it should be given like this.

pli-tv-kd13:1.2.2.0.eng: 1.1 Trial periods for those with unconcealed offenses

pli-tv-kd13:1.2.2.1.pli: Tena, bhikkhave, udāyinā bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd13:1.2.2.1.eng: “The monk Udāyī should approach the Sangha, arrange his upper robe over one shoulder, pay respect at the feet of the senior monks, squat on his heels, raise his joined palms, and say:

pli-tv-kd13:1.2.3.pli: ‘ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:1.2.3.eng: ‘Venerables, I’ve committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:1.2.4.pli: Sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācāmi.
pli-tv-kd13:1.2.4.eng: I ask the Sangha for the trial period of six days for that offense.

pli-tv-kd13:1.2.5.pli: Ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:1.2.5.eng: I’ve committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:1.2.6.pli: Dutiyampi, sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācāmi.
pli-tv-kd13:1.2.6.eng: For the second time, I ask the Sangha for the trial period of six days for that offense.

pli-tv-kd13:1.2.7.pli: Ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:1.2.7.eng: I’ve committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:1.2.8.pli: Tatiyampi sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:1.2.8.eng: For the third time, I ask the Sangha for the trial period of six days for that offense.’

pli-tv-kd13:1.3.1.eng: A competent and capable monk should then inform the Sangha:

pli-tv-kd13:1.3.2.eng: ‘Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:1.3.3.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:1.3.3.eng: The monk Udāyī has committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:1.3.4.pli: So saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:1.3.4.eng: He’s asking the Sangha for the trial period of six days for that offense.

pli-tv-kd13:1.3.5.pli: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-kd13:1.3.5.eng: If the Sangha is ready, it should give him that trial period.

pli-tv-kd13:1.3.7.eng: Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:1.3.8.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:1.3.8.eng: The monk Udāyī has committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:1.3.9.pli: So saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:1.3.9.eng: He’s asking the Sangha for the trial period of six days for that offense.

pli-tv-kd13:1.3.10.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ deti.
pli-tv-kd13:1.3.10.eng: The Sangha gives him that trial period.

pli-tv-kd13:1.3.11.pli: Yassāyasmato khamati udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattassa dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd13:1.3.11.eng: Any monk who approves of giving him that trial period of six days should remain silent.

pli-tv-kd13:1.3.12.eng: Any monk who doesn’t approve should speak up.

pli-tv-kd13:1.3.13.eng: For the second time, I speak on this matter.

pli-tv-kd13:1.3.14.eng: Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:1.3.15.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:1.3.15.eng: The monk Udāyī has committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:1.3.16.pli: So saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:1.3.16.eng: He’s asking the Sangha for the trial period of six days for that offense.

pli-tv-kd13:1.3.17.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ deti.
pli-tv-kd13:1.3.17.eng: The Sangha gives him that trial period.

pli-tv-kd13:1.3.18.pli: Yassāyasmato khamati udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattassa dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd13:1.3.18.eng: Any monk who approves of giving him that trial period of six days should remain silent.

pli-tv-kd13:1.3.19.eng: Any monk who doesn’t approve should speak up.

pli-tv-kd13:1.3.20.eng: For the third time, I speak on this matter.

pli-tv-kd13:1.3.21.eng: Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:1.3.22.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:1.3.22.eng: The monk Udāyī has committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:1.3.23.pli: So saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:1.3.23.eng: He’s asking the Sangha for the trial period of six days for that offense.

pli-tv-kd13:1.3.24.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ deti.
pli-tv-kd13:1.3.24.eng: The Sangha gives him the trial period.

pli-tv-kd13:1.3.25.pli: Yassāyasmato khamati udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattassa dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd13:1.3.25.eng: Any monk who approves of giving him that trial period of six days should remain silent.

pli-tv-kd13:1.3.26.eng: Any monk who doesn’t approve should speak up.

pli-tv-kd13:1.3.27.pli: Dinnaṃ saṅghena udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:1.3.27.eng: The Sangha has given the monk Udāyī the trial period of six days for one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:1.3.28.pli: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:1.3.28.eng: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.’”

pli-tv-kd13:2.1.0.eng: Rehabilitation for those with unconcealed offenses

pli-tv-kd13:2.1.1.eng: When he had completed that trial period, he told the monks,

pli-tv-kd13:2.1.2.pli: “ahaṃ, āvuso, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:2.1.2.eng: “I had committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:2.1.3.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:2.1.3.eng: I asked the Sangha to give me the trial period of six days for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:2.1.4.pli: Tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:2.1.8.pli: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ abbhetu.
pli-tv-kd13:2.1.8.eng: “Well then, the Sangha should rehabilitate the monk Udāyī.

pli-tv-kd13:2.2.1.eng: And it should be done like this.

pli-tv-kd13:2.2.2.pli: Tena, bhikkhave, udāyinā bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd13:2.2.2.eng: The monk Udāyī should approach the Sangha, arrange his upper robe over one shoulder, pay respect at the feet of the senior monks, squat on his heels, raise his joined palms, and say:

pli-tv-kd13:2.2.3.pli: ‘ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:2.2.3.eng: ‘Venerables, I had committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen. I asked the Sangha to give me the trial period of six days for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:2.2.4.pli: Tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:2.2.5.pli: Sohaṃ, bhante, ciṇṇamānatto saṅghaṃ abbhānaṃ yācāmi.
pli-tv-kd13:2.2.5.eng: I’ve now completed that trial period and ask the Sangha for rehabilitation.

pli-tv-kd13:2.2.6.pli: Ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:2.2.6.eng: I had committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:2.2.7.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:2.2.7.eng: I asked the Sangha to give me the trial period of six days for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:2.2.8.pli: Tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:2.2.9.pli: Sohaṃ ciṇṇamānatto dutiyampi, bhante, saṅghaṃ abbhānaṃ yācāmi.
pli-tv-kd13:2.2.9.eng: I’ve now completed that trial period, and for the second time, I ask the Sangha for rehabilitation.

pli-tv-kd13:2.2.10.pli: Ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:2.2.10.eng: I had committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:2.2.11.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:2.2.11.eng: I asked the Sangha to give me the trial period of six days for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:2.2.12.pli: Tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:2.2.13.pli: Sohaṃ ciṇṇamānatto tatiyampi, bhante, saṅghaṃ abbhānaṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:2.2.13.eng: I’ve now completed that trial period and, for the third time, I ask the Sangha for rehabilitation.’

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.1.eng: A competent and capable monk should then inform the Sangha:

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.2.eng: ‘Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.3.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:2.3.3.eng: The monk Udāyī had committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.4.pli: So saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:2.3.4.eng: He asked the Sangha to give him the trial period of six days for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.5.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.6.eng: He’s now completed that trial period and is asking the Sangha for rehabilitation.

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.7.pli: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ abbheyya.
pli-tv-kd13:2.3.7.eng: If the Sangha is ready, it should rehabilitate him.

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.9.eng: Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.10.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:2.3.10.eng: The monk Udāyī had committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.11.pli: So saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:2.3.11.eng: He asked the Sangha to give him the trial period of six days for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.12.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.13.eng: He’s now completed that trial period and is asking the Sangha for rehabilitation.

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.15.pli: Yassāyasmato khamati udāyissa bhikkhuno abbhānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd13:2.3.15.eng: Any monk who approves of rehabilitating him should remain silent.

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.16.eng: Any monk who doesn’t approve should speak up.

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.17.eng: For the second time, I speak on this matter.

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.18.eng: Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.19.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:2.3.19.eng: The monk Udāyī had committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.20.pli: So saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:2.3.20.eng: He asked the Sangha to give him the trial period of six days for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.21.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.22.eng: He’s now completed that trial period and is asking the Sangha for rehabilitation.

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.24.pli: Yassāyasmato khamati udāyissa bhikkhuno abbhānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd13:2.3.24.eng: Any monk who approves of rehabilitating him should remain silent.

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.25.eng: Any monk who doesn’t approve should speak up.

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.26.eng: For the third time, I speak on this matter.

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.27.eng: Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.28.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:2.3.28.eng: The monk Udāyī had committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.29.pli: So saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:2.3.29.eng: He asked the Sangha to give him the trial period of six days for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.30.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.31.eng: He’s now completed that trial period and is asking the Sangha for rehabilitation.

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.33.pli: Yassāyasmato khamati udāyissa bhikkhuno abbhānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd13:2.3.33.eng: Any monk who approves of rehabilitating him should remain silent.

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.34.eng: Any monk who doesn’t approve should speak up.

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.35.eng: The Sangha has rehabilitated the monk Udāyī.

pli-tv-kd13:2.3.36.pli: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:2.3.36.eng: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.’”

pli-tv-kd13:3.1.0.eng: Probation for those with offenses concealed for one day

pli-tv-kd13:3.1.1.pli: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā udāyī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno hoti sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:3.1.1.eng: On one occasion Venerable Udāyī had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for one day.

pli-tv-kd13:3.1.2.eng: He told the monks about this,

pli-tv-kd13:3.1.3.pli: “ahaṃ, āvuso, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannaṃ.

pli-tv-kd13:3.1.6.pli: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ detu.
pli-tv-kd13:3.1.6.eng: “Well then, the Sangha should give the monk Udāyī probation for one day for one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for one day.

pli-tv-kd13:3.2.1.eng: And it should be given like this.

pli-tv-kd13:3.2.2.pli: Tena, bhikkhave, udāyinā bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd13:3.2.2.eng: The monk Udāyī should approach the Sangha, arrange his upper robe over one shoulder, pay respect at the feet of the senior monks, squat on his heels, raise his joined palms, and say:

pli-tv-kd13:3.2.3.pli: ‘ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:3.2.3.eng: ‘Venerables, I’ve committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for one day.

pli-tv-kd13:3.2.4.pli: Sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:3.2.4.eng: I ask the Sangha for probation for one day for that offense.’

pli-tv-kd13:3.2.5.eng: And he should ask a second

pli-tv-kd13:3.3.1.eng: A competent and capable monk should then inform the Sangha:

pli-tv-kd13:3.3.2.eng: ‘Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:3.3.3.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:3.3.3.eng: The monk Udāyī has committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for one day.

pli-tv-kd13:3.3.4.pli: So saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:3.3.4.eng: He’s asking the Sangha for probation for one day for that offense.

pli-tv-kd13:3.3.5.pli: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-kd13:3.3.5.eng: If the Sangha is ready, it should give him that probation.

pli-tv-kd13:3.3.7.eng: Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:3.3.8.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:3.3.8.eng: The monk Udāyī has committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for one day.

pli-tv-kd13:3.3.9.pli: So saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:3.3.9.eng: He’s asking the Sangha for probation for one day for that offense.

pli-tv-kd13:3.3.10.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ deti.
pli-tv-kd13:3.3.10.eng: The Sangha gives him that probation.

pli-tv-kd13:3.3.11.pli: Yassāyasmato khamati udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsassa dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd13:3.3.11.eng: Any monk who approves of giving him that probation should remain silent.

pli-tv-kd13:3.3.12.eng: Any monk who doesn’t approve should speak up.

pli-tv-kd13:3.3.13.eng: For the second time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:3.3.14.eng: For the third time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:3.3.15.pli: Dinno saṅghena udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāso.
pli-tv-kd13:3.3.15.eng: The Sangha has given the monk Udāyī probation for one day for one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for one day.

pli-tv-kd13:3.3.16.pli: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:3.3.16.eng: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.’”

pli-tv-kd13:4.1.0.eng: Trial periods for those with offenses concealed for one day

pli-tv-kd13:4.1.1.eng: When he had completed that probation, he told the monks,

pli-tv-kd13:4.1.2.pli: “ahaṃ, āvuso, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:4.1.2.eng: “I had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for one day.

pli-tv-kd13:4.1.3.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:4.1.3.eng: I asked the Sangha to give me probation for one day for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:4.1.4.pli: Tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:4.1.8.pli: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ detu.
pli-tv-kd13:4.1.8.eng: “Well then, the Sangha should give the monk Udāyī the trial period of six days for one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for one day.

pli-tv-kd13:4.2.1.eng: And it should be given like this.

pli-tv-kd13:4.2.2.pli: Tena, bhikkhave, udāyinā bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:4.2.2.eng: The monk Udāyī should approach the Sangha, arrange his upper robe over one shoulder, pay respect at the feet of the senior monks, squat on his heels, raise his joined palms,

pli-tv-kd13:4.2.4.pli: ‘ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:4.2.4.eng: ‘Venerables, I had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for one day.

pli-tv-kd13:4.2.5.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:4.2.5.eng: I asked the Sangha to give me probation for one day for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:4.2.6.pli: Tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:4.2.7.pli: Sohaṃ, bhante, parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:4.2.7.eng: I’ve now completed that probation and ask the Sangha for the trial period of six days.’

pli-tv-kd13:4.2.8.eng: And he should ask a second

pli-tv-kd13:4.3.1.eng: A competent and capable monk should then inform the Sangha:

pli-tv-kd13:4.3.2.eng: ‘Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:4.3.3.eng: The monk Udāyī had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for one day.

pli-tv-kd13:4.3.4.eng: He asked the Sangha to give him probation for one day for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:4.3.6.pli: So parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:4.3.6.eng: He’s now completed that probation and is asking the Sangha for the trial period of six days.

pli-tv-kd13:4.3.7.pli: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-kd13:4.3.7.eng: If the Sangha is ready, it should give him that trial period.

pli-tv-kd13:4.3.9.eng: Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:4.3.10.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:4.3.10.eng: The monk Udāyī had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for one day.

pli-tv-kd13:4.3.11.pli: So saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:4.3.11.eng: He asked the Sangha to give him probation for one day for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:4.3.12.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:4.3.13.pli: So parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:4.3.13.eng: He’s now completed that probation and is asking the Sangha for the trial period of six days.

pli-tv-kd13:4.3.14.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ deti.
pli-tv-kd13:4.3.14.eng: The Sangha gives him that trial period.

pli-tv-kd13:4.3.15.pli: Yassāyasmato khamati udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattassa dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd13:4.3.15.eng: Any monk who approves of giving him the trial period of six days should remain silent.

pli-tv-kd13:4.3.16.eng: Any monk who doesn’t approve should speak up.

pli-tv-kd13:4.3.17.eng: For the second time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:4.3.18.eng: For the third time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:4.3.19.pli: Dinnaṃ saṅghena udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:4.3.19.eng: The Sangha has given the monk Udāyī the trial period of six days for one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for one day.

pli-tv-kd13:4.3.20.pli: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:4.3.20.eng: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.’”

pli-tv-kd13:5.1.0.eng: Rehabilitation for those with offenses concealed for one day

pli-tv-kd13:5.1.1.eng: When he had completed that trial period, he told the monks,

pli-tv-kd13:5.1.2.pli: “ahaṃ, āvuso, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:5.1.2.eng: “I had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for one day.

pli-tv-kd13:5.1.3.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:5.1.3.eng: I asked the Sangha to give me probation for one day for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:5.1.4.pli: Tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:5.1.5.pli: Sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:5.1.5.eng: When I had completed that probation, I asked the Sangha to give me the trial period of six days,

pli-tv-kd13:5.1.6.pli: Tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:5.1.10.pli: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ abbhetu.
pli-tv-kd13:5.1.10.eng: “Well then, the Sangha should rehabilitate the monk Udāyī.

pli-tv-kd13:5.2.1.eng: And it should be done like this.

pli-tv-kd13:5.2.2.pli: Tena, bhikkhave, udāyinā bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:5.2.2.eng: The monk Udāyī should approach the Sangha, put his upper robe over one shoulder, pay respect at the feet of the senior monks, squat on his heels, raise his joined palms,

pli-tv-kd13:5.2.4.pli: ‘ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:5.2.4.eng: ‘I had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for one day.

pli-tv-kd13:5.2.5.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:5.2.5.eng: I asked the Sangha to give me probation for one day for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:5.2.6.pli: Tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:5.2.7.pli: Sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:5.2.7.eng: When I had completed that probation, I asked the Sangha to give me the trial period of six days,

pli-tv-kd13:5.2.8.pli: Tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:5.2.9.pli: Sohaṃ, bhante, ciṇṇamānatto saṅghaṃ abbhānaṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:5.2.9.eng: I’ve now completed the trial period and ask the Sangha for rehabilitation.’

pli-tv-kd13:5.2.10.eng: And he should ask a second

pli-tv-kd13:5.3.1.eng: A competent and capable monk should then inform the Sangha:

pli-tv-kd13:5.3.2.eng: ‘Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:5.3.3.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:5.3.3.eng: The monk Udāyī had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for one day.

pli-tv-kd13:5.3.4.pli: So saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:5.3.4.eng: He asked the Sangha to give him probation for one day for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:5.3.5.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:5.3.6.pli: So parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:5.3.6.eng: When he had completed that probation, he asked the Sangha to give him the trial period of six days,

pli-tv-kd13:5.3.7.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:5.3.8.eng: He’s now completed that trial period and is asking the Sangha for rehabilitation.

pli-tv-kd13:5.3.9.pli: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ abbheyya.
pli-tv-kd13:5.3.9.eng: If the Sangha is ready, it should rehabilitate him.

pli-tv-kd13:5.3.11.eng: Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:5.3.12.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:5.3.12.eng: The monk Udāyī had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for one day.

pli-tv-kd13:5.3.13.pli: So saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:5.3.13.eng: He asked the Sangha to give him probation for one day for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:5.3.14.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:5.3.15.pli: So parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:5.3.15.eng: When he had completed that probation, he asked the Sangha to give him the trial period of six days,

pli-tv-kd13:5.3.16.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:5.3.17.eng: He’s now completed that trial period and is asking the Sangha for rehabilitation.

pli-tv-kd13:5.3.19.pli: Yassāyasmato khamati udāyissa bhikkhuno abbhānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd13:5.3.19.eng: Any monk who approves of rehabilitating him should remain silent.

pli-tv-kd13:5.3.20.eng: Any monk who doesn’t approve should speak up.

pli-tv-kd13:5.3.21.eng: For the second time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:5.3.22.eng: For the third time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:5.3.23.eng: The Sangha has rehabilitated the monk Udāyī.

pli-tv-kd13:5.3.24.pli: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:5.3.24.eng: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.’”

pli-tv-kd13:6.1.0.eng: Probation for those with offenses concealed for five days

pli-tv-kd13:6.1.1.pli: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā udāyī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno hoti sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ dvīhappaṭicchannaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:6.1.1.eng: On one occasion Venerable Udāyī had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for two days. …

pli-tv-kd13:6.1.5.eng: He told the monks about this,

pli-tv-kd13:6.1.6.pli: “ahaṃ, āvuso, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.

pli-tv-kd13:6.1.9.pli: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya pañcāhaparivāsaṃ detu.
pli-tv-kd13:6.1.9.eng: “Well then, the Sangha should give the monk Udāyī probation for five days for one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:6.1.10.eng: And it should be given like this.

pli-tv-kd13:6.1.11.pli: Tena, bhikkhave, udāyinā bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd13:6.1.11.eng: The monk Udāyī should approach the Sangha, arrange his upper robe over one shoulder, pay respect at the feet of the senior monks, squat on his heels, raise his joined palms, and say:

pli-tv-kd13:6.1.12.pli: ‘ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:6.1.12.eng: ‘Venerables, I’ve committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:6.1.13.pli: Sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya pañcāhaparivāsaṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:6.1.13.eng: I ask the Sangha for probation for five days for that offense.’

pli-tv-kd13:6.1.14.eng: And he should ask a second

pli-tv-kd13:6.1.16.eng: A competent and capable monk should then inform the Sangha:

pli-tv-kd13:6.1.17.eng: ‘Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:6.1.18.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:6.1.18.eng: The monk Udāyī has committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:6.1.19.pli: So saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya pañcāhaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:6.1.19.eng: He’s asking the Sangha for probation for five days for that offense.

pli-tv-kd13:6.1.20.pli: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya pañcāhaparivāsaṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-kd13:6.1.20.eng: If the Sangha is ready, it should give him that probation.

pli-tv-kd13:6.1.22.eng: Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:6.1.23.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:6.1.23.eng: The monk Udāyī has committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:6.1.24.pli: So saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya pañcāhaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:6.1.24.eng: He’s asking the Sangha for probation for five days for that offense.

pli-tv-kd13:6.1.25.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya pañcāhaparivāsaṃ deti.
pli-tv-kd13:6.1.25.eng: The Sangha gives him that probation.

pli-tv-kd13:6.1.26.pli: Yassāyasmato khamati udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya pañcāhaparivāsassa dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd13:6.1.26.eng: Any monk who approves of giving him that probation should remain silent.

pli-tv-kd13:6.1.27.eng: Any monk who doesn’t approve should speak up.

pli-tv-kd13:6.1.28.eng: For the second time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:6.1.29.eng: For the third time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:6.1.30.pli: Dinno saṅghena udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya pañcāhaparivāso.
pli-tv-kd13:6.1.30.eng: The Sangha has given the monk Udāyī probation for five days for one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:6.1.31.pli: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:6.1.31.eng: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.’”

pli-tv-kd13:7.1.0.eng: Sending back to the beginning of those on probation

pli-tv-kd13:7.1.1.pli: So parivasanto antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:7.1.1.eng: While on probation, he committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:7.1.3.pli: “ahaṃ, āvuso, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:7.1.3.eng: “I had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:7.1.4.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya pañcāhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:7.1.4.eng: I asked the Sangha to give me probation for five days for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:7.1.5.pli: Tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya pañcāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:7.1.6.pli: Sohaṃ parivasanto antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:7.1.6.eng: While on probation, I committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:7.1.9.pli: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassatu.
pli-tv-kd13:7.1.9.eng: “Well then, the Sangha should send the monk Udāyī back to the beginning for one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen, committed while on probation.

pli-tv-kd13:7.2.1.eng: And it should be done like this.

pli-tv-kd13:7.2.2.pli: Tena, bhikkhave, udāyinā bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:7.2.2.eng: The monk Udāyī should approach the Sangha, arrange his upper robe over one shoulder, pay respect at the feet of the senior monks, squat on his heels, raise his joined palms,

pli-tv-kd13:7.2.4.pli: ‘ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:7.2.4.eng: ‘Venerables, I had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:7.2.5.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya pañcāhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:7.2.5.eng: I asked the Sangha to give me probation for five days for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:7.2.6.pli: Tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya pañcāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:7.2.7.pli: Sohaṃ parivasanto antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:7.2.7.eng: While on probation, I committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:7.2.8.pli: Sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:7.2.8.eng: I ask the Sangha to send me back to the beginning for that offense.’

pli-tv-kd13:7.2.9.eng: And he should ask a second

pli-tv-kd13:7.3.1.eng: A competent and capable monk should then inform the Sangha:

pli-tv-kd13:7.3.2.eng: ‘Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:7.3.3.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:7.3.3.eng: The monk Udāyī had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:7.3.4.pli: So saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya pañcāhaparivāsaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:7.3.4.eng: He asked the Sangha to give him probation for five days for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:7.3.5.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya pañcāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:7.3.6.pli: So parivasanto antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:7.3.6.eng: While on probation, he committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:7.3.7.pli: So saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:7.3.7.eng: He’s now asking the Sangha to send him back to the beginning for that offense.

pli-tv-kd13:7.3.8.pli: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikasseyya.
pli-tv-kd13:7.3.8.eng: If the Sangha is ready, it should send him back to the beginning.

pli-tv-kd13:7.3.10.eng: Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:7.3.11.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:7.3.11.eng: The monk Udāyī had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:7.3.12.pli: So saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya pañcāhaparivāsaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:7.3.12.eng: He asked the Sangha to give him probation for five days for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:7.3.13.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya pañcāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:7.3.14.pli: So parivasanto antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:7.3.14.eng: While on probation, he committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:7.3.15.pli: So saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:7.3.15.eng: He’s now asking the Sangha to send him back to the beginning for that offense.

pli-tv-kd13:7.3.16.pli: Saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassati.
pli-tv-kd13:7.3.16.eng: The Sangha sends him back to the beginning.

pli-tv-kd13:7.3.17.pli: Yassāyasmato khamati udāyissa bhikkhuno antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanā, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd13:7.3.17.eng: Any monk who approves of sending him back to the beginning should remain silent.

pli-tv-kd13:7.3.18.eng: Any monk who doesn’t approve should speak up.

pli-tv-kd13:7.3.19.eng: For the second time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:7.3.20.eng: For the third time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:7.3.21.pli: Paṭikassito saṅghena udāyī bhikkhu antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanā.
pli-tv-kd13:7.3.21.eng: The Sangha has sent the monk Udāyī back to the beginning for one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen, committed while on probation.

pli-tv-kd13:7.3.22.pli: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:7.3.22.eng: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.’”

pli-tv-kd13:8.1.0.eng: Sending back to the beginning of those deserving the trial period

pli-tv-kd13:8.1.1.pli: So parivutthaparivāso mānattāraho antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:8.1.1.eng: When he had completed that probation, while deserving the trial period, he committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:8.1.3.pli: “ahaṃ, āvuso, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:8.1.3.eng: “I had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:8.1.4.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya pañcāhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:8.1.4.eng: I asked the Sangha to give me probation for five days for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:8.1.5.pli: Tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya pañcāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:8.1.6.pli: Sohaṃ parivasanto antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:8.1.6.eng: While on probation, I committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:8.1.7.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:8.1.7.eng: I asked the Sangha to send me back to the beginning for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:8.1.8.pli: Taṃ maṃ saṅgho antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassi.

pli-tv-kd13:8.1.9.pli: Sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso mānattāraho antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:8.1.9.eng: When I had completed the probation, while deserving the trial period, I committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:8.1.12.pli: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassatu.
pli-tv-kd13:8.1.12.eng: “Well then, the Sangha should send the monk Udāyī back to the beginning for one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen, committed while deserving the trial period.

pli-tv-kd13:8.2.1.eng: And it should be done like this.

pli-tv-kd13:8.2.2.pli: Tena, bhikkhave, udāyinā bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:8.2.2.eng: The monk Udāyī should approach the Sangha, arrange his upper robe over one shoulder, pay respect at the feet of the senior monks, squat on his heels, raise his joined palms,

pli-tv-kd13:8.2.4.pli: ‘ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:8.2.4.eng: ‘Venerables, I had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days. …

pli-tv-kd13:8.2.5.pli: sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso mānattāraho antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:8.2.5.eng: When I had completed the probation, while deserving the trial period, I committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:8.2.6.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:8.2.6.eng: I ask the Sangha to send me back to the beginning for that offense.’

pli-tv-kd13:8.3.2.eng: ‘Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:8.3.3.eng: The monk Udāyī had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days. …

pli-tv-kd13:8.3.8.eng: Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:8.3.9.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:8.3.9.eng: The monk Udāyī had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days. …

pli-tv-kd13:8.3.10.pli: so parivutthaparivāso mānattāraho antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:8.3.10.eng: When he had completed that probation, while deserving the trial period, he committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:8.3.11.pli: So saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:8.3.11.eng: He’s asking the Sangha to send him back to the beginning for that offense.

pli-tv-kd13:8.3.12.pli: Saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassati.
pli-tv-kd13:8.3.12.eng: The Sangha sends him back to the beginning.

pli-tv-kd13:8.3.13.pli: Yassāyasmato khamati udāyissa bhikkhuno antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanā, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd13:8.3.13.eng: Any monk who approves of sending him back to the beginning should remain silent.

pli-tv-kd13:8.3.14.eng: Any monk who doesn’t approve should speak up.

pli-tv-kd13:8.3.15.eng: For the second time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:8.3.16.eng: For the third time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:8.3.17.pli: Paṭikassito saṅghena udāyī bhikkhu antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanā.
pli-tv-kd13:8.3.17.eng: The Sangha has sent the monk Udāyī back to the beginning for one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen, committed while deserving the trial period.

pli-tv-kd13:8.3.18.pli: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:8.3.18.eng: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.’”

pli-tv-kd13:9.1.0.eng: Trial period for the three offenses

pli-tv-kd13:9.1.1.eng: When he had completed that probation, he told the monks,

pli-tv-kd13:9.1.2.pli: “ahaṃ, āvuso, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:9.1.2.eng: “I had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days …

pli-tv-kd13:9.1.6.pli: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno tissannaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ detu.
pli-tv-kd13:9.1.6.eng: “Well then, the Sangha should give the monk Udāyī the trial period of six days for the three offenses.

pli-tv-kd13:9.2.1.eng: And it should be given like this.

pli-tv-kd13:9.2.2.pli: Tena, bhikkhave, udāyinā bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:9.2.2.eng: The monk Udāyī should approach the Sangha, arrange his upper robe over one shoulder, pay respect at the feet of the senior monks, squat on his heels, raise his joined palms,

pli-tv-kd13:9.2.4.pli: ‘ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:9.2.4.eng: ‘Venerables, I had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:9.2.5.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya pañcāhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:9.2.5.eng: I asked the Sangha to give me probation for five days for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:9.2.6.pli: Tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya pañcāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi …pe…

pli-tv-kd13:9.2.7.pli: sohaṃ, bhante, parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ tissannaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:9.2.7.eng: I’ve now completed that probation and ask the Sangha for the trial period of six days for the three offenses.’

pli-tv-kd13:9.2.8.eng: And he should ask a second

pli-tv-kd13:9.3.1.eng: A competent and capable monk should then inform the Sangha:

pli-tv-kd13:9.3.2.eng: ‘Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:9.3.3.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:9.3.3.eng: The monk Udāyī had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days. …

pli-tv-kd13:9.3.4.pli: so parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ tissannaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:9.3.4.eng: He’s now completed that probation and is asking the Sangha for the trial period of six days for the three offenses.

pli-tv-kd13:9.3.5.pli: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno tissannaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-kd13:9.3.5.eng: If the Sangha is ready, it should give him that trial period.

pli-tv-kd13:9.3.7.eng: Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:9.3.8.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:9.3.8.eng: The monk Udāyī had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days. …

pli-tv-kd13:9.3.9.pli: so parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ tissannaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:9.3.9.eng: He’s now completed that probation and is asking the Sangha for the trial period of six days for the three offenses.

pli-tv-kd13:9.3.10.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno tissannaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ deti.
pli-tv-kd13:9.3.10.eng: The Sangha gives him that trial period.

pli-tv-kd13:9.3.11.pli: Yassāyasmato khamati udāyissa bhikkhuno tissannaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattassa dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd13:9.3.11.eng: Any monk who approves of giving him the trial period of six days should remain silent.

pli-tv-kd13:9.3.12.eng: Any monk who doesn’t approve should speak up.

pli-tv-kd13:9.3.13.eng: For the second time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:9.3.14.eng: For the third time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:9.3.15.pli: Dinnaṃ saṅghena udāyissa bhikkhuno tissannaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:9.3.15.eng: The Sangha has given the monk Udāyī the trial period of six days for the three offenses.

pli-tv-kd13:9.3.16.pli: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:9.3.16.eng: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.’”

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.0.eng: Sending back to the beginning of those undertaking the trial period

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.1.pli: So mānattaṃ caranto antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:10.1.1.eng: While he was undertaking the trial period, he committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.3.pli: “ahaṃ, āvuso, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:10.1.3.eng: “I had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days. …

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.4.pli: sohaṃ mānattaṃ caranto antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:10.1.4.eng: While undertaking the trial period, I committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.7.pli: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassitvā chārattaṃ mānattaṃ detu.
pli-tv-kd13:10.1.7.eng: “Well then, the Sangha should send the monk Udāyī back to the beginning for one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen, committed while undertaking the trial period. It should then give him the trial period of six days.

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.8.eng: And he should be sent back to the beginning like this.

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.9.pli: tena, bhikkhave, udāyinā bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:10.1.9.eng: The monk Udāyī should approach the Sangha, arrange his upper robe over one shoulder, pay respect at the feet of the senior monks, squat on his heels, raise his joined palms,

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.11.pli: ‘ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:10.1.11.eng: ‘Venerables, I had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days. …

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.12.pli: sohaṃ mānattaṃ caranto antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:10.1.12.eng: While undertaking the trial period, I committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.13.pli: Sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:10.1.13.eng: I ask the Sangha to send me back to the beginning for that offense.’

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.14.eng: And he should ask a second

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.16.eng: A competent and capable monk should then inform the Sangha:

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.17.eng: ‘Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.19.eng: is asking the Sangha to send him back to the beginning for that offense, committed while undertaking the trial period.

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.20.pli: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikasseyya.
pli-tv-kd13:10.1.20.eng: If the Sangha is ready, it should send him back to the beginning.

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.22.pli: paṭikassito saṅghena udāyī bhikkhu antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanā.
pli-tv-kd13:10.1.22.eng: The Sangha has sent the monk Udāyī back to the beginning for one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen, committed while undertaking the trial period.

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.23.pli: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmīti.
pli-tv-kd13:10.1.23.eng: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.’

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.24.pli: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, chārattaṃ mānattaṃ dātabbaṃ—
pli-tv-kd13:10.1.24.eng: And he should be given the trial period of six days like this.

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.25.eng: The monk Udāyī should approach the Sangha, arrange his upper robe over one shoulder, pay respect at the feet of the senior monks, squat on his heels, raise his joined palms,

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.27.pli: ‘ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:10.1.27.eng: ‘Venerables, I had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days. …

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.28.pli: sohaṃ mānattaṃ caranto antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:10.1.28.eng: While undertaking the trial period, I committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.29.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:10.1.29.eng: I asked the Sangha to send me back to the beginning for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.30.pli: Taṃ maṃ saṅgho antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassi.

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.31.pli: Sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:10.1.31.eng: I now ask the Sangha for the trial period of six days for that offense.’

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.32.eng: And he should ask a second

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.34.eng: A competent and capable monk should then inform the Sangha:

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.35.eng: ‘Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.37.eng: is asking the Sangha for the trial period of six days for that offense, committed while undertaking the trial period.

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.38.pli: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-kd13:10.1.38.eng: If the Sangha is ready, it should give him that trial period.

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.40.pli: Dinnaṃ saṅghena udāyissa bhikkhuno antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:10.1.40.eng: The Sangha has given the monk Udāyī the trial period of six days for one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen, committed while undertaking the trial period.

pli-tv-kd13:10.1.41.pli: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:10.1.41.eng: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.’”

pli-tv-kd13:11.1.0.eng: Sending back to the beginning of those deserving rehabilitation

pli-tv-kd13:11.1.1.pli: So ciṇṇamānatto abbhānāraho antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:11.1.1.eng: When he had completed that trial period, while deserving rehabilitation, he committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:11.1.3.pli: “ahaṃ, āvuso, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:11.1.3.eng: “I had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days. …

pli-tv-kd13:11.1.4.pli: sohaṃ ciṇṇamānatto abbhānāraho antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:11.1.4.eng: When I had completed the trial period, while deserving rehabilitation, I committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:11.1.7.pli: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassitvā chārattaṃ mānattaṃ detu.
pli-tv-kd13:11.1.7.eng: “Well then, the Sangha should send the monk Udāyī back to the beginning for one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen, committed while deserving rehabilitation. It should then give him the trial period of six days.

pli-tv-kd13:11.1.8.eng: And he should be sent back to the beginning like this. …

pli-tv-kd13:11.1.9.pli: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, chārattaṃ mānattaṃ dātabbaṃ …pe….
pli-tv-kd13:11.1.9.eng: And he should be given the trial period of six days like this. …

pli-tv-kd13:11.1.10.pli: Dinnaṃ saṅghena udāyissa bhikkhuno antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:11.1.10.eng: The Sangha has given the monk Udāyī the trial period of six days for one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen, committed while deserving rehabilitation.

pli-tv-kd13:11.1.11.pli: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:11.1.11.eng: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.’”

pli-tv-kd13:12.1.0.eng: Rehabilitation of those sent back to the beginning

pli-tv-kd13:12.1.1.eng: When he had completed that trial period, he told the monks,

pli-tv-kd13:12.1.2.pli: “ahaṃ, āvuso, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:12.1.2.eng: “I had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days. …

pli-tv-kd13:12.1.3.eng: I’ve now completed the trial period.

pli-tv-kd13:12.1.6.pli: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ abbhetu.
pli-tv-kd13:12.1.6.eng: “Well then, the Sangha should rehabilitate the monk Udāyī.

pli-tv-kd13:12.2.1.eng: And it should be done like this.

pli-tv-kd13:12.2.2.pli: Tena, bhikkhave, udāyinā bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:12.2.2.eng: The monk Udāyī should approach the Sangha, arrange his upper robe over one shoulder, pay respect at the feet of the senior monks, squat on his heels, raise his joined palms,

pli-tv-kd13:12.2.4.pli: ‘ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:12.2.4.eng: ‘Venerables, I had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:12.2.5.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya pañcāhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:12.2.5.eng: I asked the Sangha to give me probation for five days for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:12.2.6.pli: Tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya pañcāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:12.2.7.pli: Sohaṃ parivasanto antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:12.2.7.eng: While on probation, I committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:12.2.8.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:12.2.8.eng: I asked the Sangha to send me back to the beginning for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:12.2.9.pli: Taṃ maṃ saṅgho antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassi.

pli-tv-kd13:12.2.10.pli: Sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso mānattāraho antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:12.2.10.eng: When I had completed the probation, while deserving the trial period, I committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:12.2.11.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:12.2.11.eng: I asked the Sangha to send me back to the beginning for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:12.2.12.pli: Taṃ maṃ saṅgho antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassi.

pli-tv-kd13:12.2.13.pli: Sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ tissannaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:12.2.13.eng: When I had completed the probation, I asked the Sangha to give me the trial period of six days,

pli-tv-kd13:12.2.14.pli: Tassa me saṅgho tissannaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:12.2.15.pli: Sohaṃ mānattaṃ caranto antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:12.2.15.eng: While undertaking the trial period, I committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:12.2.16.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:12.2.16.eng: I asked the Sangha to send me back to the beginning for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:12.2.17.pli: Taṃ maṃ saṅgho antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassi.

pli-tv-kd13:12.2.18.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:12.2.18.eng: I then asked the Sangha to give me the trial period for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:12.2.19.pli: Tassa me saṅgho antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:12.2.20.pli: Sohaṃ ciṇṇamānatto abbhānāraho antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:12.2.20.eng: When I had completed that trial period, while deserving rehabilitation, I committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:12.2.21.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:12.2.21.eng: I asked the Sangha to send me back to the beginning for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:12.2.22.pli: Taṃ maṃ saṅgho antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassi.

pli-tv-kd13:12.2.23.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:12.2.23.eng: I then asked the Sangha to give me the trial period for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:12.2.24.pli: Tassa me saṅgho antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:12.2.25.pli: Sohaṃ, bhante, ciṇṇamānatto saṅghaṃ abbhānaṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:12.2.25.eng: I’ve now completed the trial period and ask the Sangha for rehabilitation.’

pli-tv-kd13:12.2.26.eng: And he should ask a second

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.1.eng: A competent and capable monk should then inform the Sangha:

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.2.eng: ‘Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.3.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:12.3.3.eng: The monk Udāyī had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.4.pli: So saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya pañcāhaparivāsaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:12.3.4.eng: He asked the Sangha to give him probation for five days for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.5.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya pañcāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.6.pli: So parivasanto antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:12.3.6.eng: While on probation, he committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.7.pli: So saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:12.3.7.eng: He asked the Sangha to send him back to the beginning for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.8.pli: Saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassi.

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.9.pli: So parivutthaparivāso mānattāraho antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:12.3.9.eng: When he had completed that probation, while deserving the trial period, he committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.10.pli: So saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:12.3.10.eng: He asked the Sangha to send him back to the beginning for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.11.pli: Saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassi.

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.12.pli: So parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ tissannaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:12.3.12.eng: When he had completed that probation, he asked the Sangha to give him the trial period of six days for the three offenses,

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.13.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno tissannaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.14.pli: So mānattaṃ caranto antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:12.3.14.eng: While he was undertaking the trial period, he committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.15.pli: So saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:12.3.15.eng: He asked the Sangha to send him back to the beginning for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.16.pli: Saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassi.

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.17.pli: So saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:12.3.17.eng: He then asked the Sangha to give him the trial period for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.18.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.19.pli: So ciṇṇamānatto abbhānāraho antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:12.3.19.eng: When he had completed that trial period, while deserving rehabilitation, he committed one unconcealed offense of intentional emission of semen.

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.20.pli: So saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:12.3.20.eng: He asked the Sangha to send him back to the beginning for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.21.pli: Saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassi.

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.22.pli: So saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:12.3.22.eng: He then asked the Sangha to give him the trial period for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.23.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.24.eng: He’s now completed that trial period and is asking the Sangha for rehabilitation.

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.25.pli: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ abbheyya.
pli-tv-kd13:12.3.25.eng: If the Sangha is ready, it should rehabilitate him.

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.27.eng: ‘Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.28.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:12.3.28.eng: The monk Udāyī had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days. …

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.29.eng: He’s now completed that trial period and is asking the Sangha for rehabilitation.

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.31.pli: Yassāyasmato khamati udāyissa bhikkhuno abbhānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd13:12.3.31.eng: Any monk who approves of rehabilitating him should remain silent.

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.32.eng: Any monk who doesn’t approve should speak up.

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.33.eng: For the second time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.34.eng: For the third time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.35.eng: The Sangha has rehabilitated the monk Udāyī.

pli-tv-kd13:12.3.36.pli: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:12.3.36.eng: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.’”

pli-tv-kd13:13.1.0.eng: Probation for those with offenses concealed for a half-month

pli-tv-kd13:13.1.1.pli: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā udāyī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno hoti sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pakkhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:13.1.1.eng: On one occasion Venerable Udāyī had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for a half-month.

pli-tv-kd13:13.1.2.eng: He told the monks about this,

pli-tv-kd13:13.1.3.pli: “ahaṃ, āvuso, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pakkhappaṭicchannaṃ.

pli-tv-kd13:13.1.6.pli: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pakkhappaṭicchannāya pakkhaparivāsaṃ detu.
pli-tv-kd13:13.1.6.eng: “Well then, the Sangha should give the monk Udāyī probation for a half-month for one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for a half-month.

pli-tv-kd13:13.1.7.eng: And it should be given like this.

pli-tv-kd13:13.1.8.pli: Tena, bhikkhave, udāyinā bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:13.1.8.eng: The monk Udāyī should approach the Sangha, arrange his upper robe over one shoulder, pay respect at the feet of the senior monks, squat on his heels, raise his joined palms,

pli-tv-kd13:13.1.10.pli: ‘ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pakkhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:13.1.10.eng: ‘Venerables, I’ve committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for a half-month.

pli-tv-kd13:13.1.11.pli: Sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pakkhappaṭicchannāya pakkhaparivāsaṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:13.1.11.eng: I ask the Sangha for probation for a half-month for that offense.’

pli-tv-kd13:13.1.12.eng: And he should ask a second

pli-tv-kd13:13.1.14.eng: A competent and capable monk should then inform the Sangha:

pli-tv-kd13:13.1.15.eng: ‘Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:13.1.16.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pakkhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:13.1.16.eng: The monk Udāyī has committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for a half-month.

pli-tv-kd13:13.1.17.pli: So saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pakkhappaṭicchannāya pakkhaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:13.1.17.eng: He’s asking the Sangha for probation for a half-month for that offense.

pli-tv-kd13:13.1.18.pli: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pakkhappaṭicchannāya pakkhaparivāsaṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-kd13:13.1.18.eng: If the Sangha is ready, it should give him that probation.

pli-tv-kd13:13.1.20.eng: Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:13.1.21.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pakkhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:13.1.21.eng: The monk Udāyī has committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for a half-month.

pli-tv-kd13:13.1.22.pli: So saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pakkhappaṭicchannāya pakkhaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:13.1.22.eng: He’s asking the Sangha for probation for a half-month for that offense.

pli-tv-kd13:13.1.23.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pakkhappaṭicchannāya pakkhaparivāsaṃ deti.
pli-tv-kd13:13.1.23.eng: The Sangha gives him that probation.

pli-tv-kd13:13.1.24.pli: Yassāyasmato khamati udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pakkhappaṭicchannāya pakkhaparivāsassa dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd13:13.1.24.eng: Any monk who approves of giving him that probation should remain silent.

pli-tv-kd13:13.1.25.eng: Any monk who doesn’t approve should speak up.

pli-tv-kd13:13.1.26.eng: For the second time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:13.1.27.eng: For the third time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:13.1.28.pli: Dinno saṅghena udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pakkhappaṭicchannāya pakkhaparivāso.
pli-tv-kd13:13.1.28.eng: The Sangha has given the monk Udāyī probation for a half-month for one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for a half-month.

pli-tv-kd13:13.1.29.pli: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:13.1.29.eng: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.’”

pli-tv-kd13:14.1.0.eng: Sending back to the beginning of those on probation for a half-month

pli-tv-kd13:14.1.1.pli: So parivasanto antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:14.1.1.eng: While on probation, he committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:14.1.3.pli: “ahaṃ, āvuso, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pakkhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:14.1.3.eng: “I had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for a half-month.

pli-tv-kd13:14.1.4.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pakkhappaṭicchannāya pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:14.1.4.eng: I asked the Sangha to give me probation for a half-month for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:14.1.5.pli: Tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pakkhappaṭicchannāya pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:14.1.6.pli: Sohaṃ parivasanto antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:14.1.6.eng: While on probation, I committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:14.1.9.pli: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassitvā purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ detu.
pli-tv-kd13:14.1.9.eng: “Well then, the Sangha should send the monk Udāyī back to the beginning for one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days and committed while on probation, and it should then give him probation simultaneous with the probation for the previous offense.

pli-tv-kd13:14.2.1.eng: And he should be sent back to the beginning like this.

pli-tv-kd13:14.2.2.pli: Tena, bhikkhave, udāyinā bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:14.2.2.eng: The monk Udāyī should approach the Sangha, arrange his upper robe over one shoulder, pay respect at the feet of the senior monks, squat on his heels, raise his joined palms,

pli-tv-kd13:14.2.4.pli: ‘ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pakkhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:14.2.4.eng: ‘Venerables, I had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for a half-month.

pli-tv-kd13:14.2.5.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pakkhappaṭicchannāya pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:14.2.5.eng: I asked the Sangha to give me probation for a half-month for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:14.2.6.pli: Tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pakkhappaṭicchannāya pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:14.2.7.pli: Sohaṃ parivasanto antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:14.2.7.eng: While on probation, I committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:14.2.8.pli: Sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:14.2.8.eng: I ask the Sangha to send me back to the beginning for that offense.’

pli-tv-kd13:14.2.9.eng: And he should ask a second

pli-tv-kd13:14.2.11.eng: A competent and capable monk should then inform the Sangha:

pli-tv-kd13:14.2.12.eng: ‘Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:14.2.13.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pakkhappaṭicchannaṃ.
