pli-tv-kd13:14.2.13.eng: The monk Udāyī had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for a half-month.

pli-tv-kd13:14.2.14.pli: So saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pakkhappaṭicchannāya pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:14.2.14.eng: He asked the Sangha to give him probation for a half-month for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:14.2.15.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pakkhappaṭicchannāya pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:14.2.16.pli: So parivasanto antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:14.2.16.eng: While on probation, he committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:14.2.17.pli: So saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:14.2.17.eng: He’s now asking the Sangha to send him back to the beginning for that offense.

pli-tv-kd13:14.2.18.pli: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikasseyya.
pli-tv-kd13:14.2.18.eng: If the Sangha is ready, it should send him back to the beginning.

pli-tv-kd13:14.2.20.eng: Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:14.2.21.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pakkhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:14.2.21.eng: The monk Udāyī had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for a half-month.

pli-tv-kd13:14.2.22.pli: So saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pakkhappaṭicchannāya pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:14.2.22.eng: He asked the Sangha to give him probation for a half-month for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:14.2.23.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pakkhappaṭicchannāya pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:14.2.24.pli: So parivasanto antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:14.2.24.eng: While on probation, he committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:14.2.25.pli: So saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:14.2.25.eng: He’s now asking the Sangha to send him back to the beginning for that offense.

pli-tv-kd13:14.2.26.pli: Saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassati.
pli-tv-kd13:14.2.26.eng: The Sangha sends him back to the beginning.

pli-tv-kd13:14.2.27.pli: Yassāyasmato khamati udāyissa bhikkhuno antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanā, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd13:14.2.27.eng: Any monk who approves of sending him back to the beginning should remain silent.

pli-tv-kd13:14.2.28.eng: Any monk who doesn’t approve should speak up.

pli-tv-kd13:14.2.29.eng: For the second time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:14.2.30.eng: For the third time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:14.2.31.pli: Paṭikassito saṅghena udāyī bhikkhu antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanā.
pli-tv-kd13:14.2.31.eng: The Sangha has sent the monk Udāyī back to the beginning for one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days and committed while on probation.

pli-tv-kd13:14.2.32.pli: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:14.2.32.eng: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.’”

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.1.pli: “Evañca pana, bhikkhave, purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāso dātabbo—
pli-tv-kd13:14.3.1.eng: “And he should be given probation simultaneous with probation for the previous offense like this.

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.2.pli: tena, bhikkhave, udāyinā bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:14.3.2.eng: The monk Udāyī should approach the Sangha, arrange his upper robe over one shoulder, pay respect at the feet of the senior monks, squat on his heels, raise his joined palms,

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.4.pli: ‘ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pakkhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:14.3.4.eng: ‘I had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for a half-month.

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.5.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pakkhappaṭicchannāya pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:14.3.5.eng: I asked the Sangha to give me probation for a half-month for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.6.pli: Tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pakkhappaṭicchannāya pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.7.pli: Sohaṃ parivasanto antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:14.3.7.eng: While on probation, I committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.8.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:14.3.8.eng: I asked the Sangha to send me back to the beginning for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.9.pli: Taṃ maṃ saṅgho antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassi.

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.10.pli: Sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:14.3.10.eng: I now ask the Sangha for probation for that offense, simultaneous with the probation for the previous offense.’

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.11.eng: And he should ask a second

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.13.eng: A competent and capable monk should then inform the Sangha:

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.14.eng: ‘Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.15.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pakkhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:14.3.15.eng: The monk Udāyī had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for a half-month.

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.16.pli: So saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pakkhappaṭicchannāya pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:14.3.16.eng: He asked the Sangha to give him probation for a half-month for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.17.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pakkhappaṭicchannāya pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.18.pli: So parivasanto antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:14.3.18.eng: While on probation, he committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.19.pli: So saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:14.3.19.eng: He asked the Sangha to send him back to the beginning for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.20.pli: Saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassi.

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.21.pli: So saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:14.3.21.eng: He’s now asking the Sangha for probation for that offense, simultaneous with the probation for the previous offense.

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.22.pli: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-kd13:14.3.22.eng: If the Sangha is ready, it should give him that simultaneous probation.

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.24.eng: ‘Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.25.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pakkhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:14.3.25.eng: The monk Udāyī had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for a half-month.

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.26.pli: So saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pakkhappaṭicchannāya pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:14.3.26.eng: He asked the Sangha to give him probation for a half-month for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.27.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pakkhappaṭicchannāya pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.28.pli: So parivasanto antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:14.3.28.eng: While on probation, he committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.29.pli: So saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:14.3.29.eng: He asked the Sangha to send him back to the beginning for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.30.pli: Saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassi.

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.31.pli: So saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:14.3.31.eng: He’s now asking the Sangha for probation for that offense, simultaneous with the probation for the previous offense.

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.32.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ deti.
pli-tv-kd13:14.3.32.eng: The Sangha gives him that simultaneous probation.

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.33.pli: Yassāyasmato khamati udāyissa bhikkhuno antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāsassa dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd13:14.3.33.eng: Any monk who approves of giving him that simultaneous probation should remain silent.

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.34.eng: Any monk who doesn’t approve should speak up.

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.35.eng: For the second time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.36.eng: For the third time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.37.pli: Dinno saṅghena udāyissa bhikkhuno antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāso.
pli-tv-kd13:14.3.37.eng: The Sangha has given the monk Udāyī probation for one offense of intentional emission of semen—concealed for five days and committed while on probation—simultaneous with the probation for the previous offense.

pli-tv-kd13:14.3.38.pli: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:14.3.38.eng: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.’”

pli-tv-kd13:15.1.0.eng: Sending back to the beginning of those deserving the trial period, etc.

pli-tv-kd13:15.1.1.pli: So parivutthaparivāso mānattāraho antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:15.1.1.eng: When he had completed that probation, while deserving the trial period, he committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:15.1.3.pli: “ahaṃ, āvuso, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pakkhappaṭicchannaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:15.1.3.eng: “I had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for a half-month. …

pli-tv-kd13:15.1.4.pli: sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso mānattāraho antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:15.1.4.eng: When I had completed the probation, while deserving the trial period, I committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:15.1.7.pli: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassitvā purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ detu.
pli-tv-kd13:15.1.7.eng: “Well then, the Sangha should send the monk Udāyī back to the beginning for one offense of intentional emission of semen—concealed for five days and committed while deserving the trial period—and it should then give him probation simultaneous with probation for the previous offense.

pli-tv-kd13:15.1.8.eng: And he should be sent back to the beginning like this. …

pli-tv-kd13:15.1.9.pli: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāso dātabbo …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:15.1.9.eng: And he should be given probation simultaneous with probation for the previous offense like this. …

pli-tv-kd13:15.1.11.pli: Dinno saṅghena udāyissa bhikkhuno antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāso.
pli-tv-kd13:15.1.11.eng: The Sangha has given the monk Udāyī probation for one offense of intentional emission of semen—concealed for five days and committed while deserving the trial period—simultaneous with the probation for the previous offense.

pli-tv-kd13:15.1.12.pli: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:15.1.12.eng: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.’”

pli-tv-kd13:16.1.0.eng: Trial period for the three offenses

pli-tv-kd13:16.1.1.eng: When he had completed that probation, he told the monks,

pli-tv-kd13:16.1.2.pli: “ahaṃ, āvuso, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pakkhappaṭicchannaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:16.1.2.eng: “I had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for a half-month …

pli-tv-kd13:16.1.6.pli: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno tissannaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ detu.
pli-tv-kd13:16.1.6.eng: “Well then, the Sangha should give the monk Udāyī the trial period of six days for the three offenses.

pli-tv-kd13:16.1.7.eng: And it should be given like this.

pli-tv-kd13:16.1.8.pli: Tena, bhikkhave, udāyinā bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:16.1.8.eng: The monk Udāyī should approach the Sangha, arrange his upper robe over one shoulder, pay respect at the feet of the senior monks, squat on his heels, raise his joined palms,

pli-tv-kd13:16.1.10.pli: ‘ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pakkhappaṭicchannaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:16.1.10.eng: ‘Venerables, I had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for a half-month. …

pli-tv-kd13:16.1.11.pli: sohaṃ, bhante, parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ tissannaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:16.1.11.eng: I’ve now completed that probation and ask the Sangha for the trial period of six days for the three offenses.’

pli-tv-kd13:16.1.12.eng: And he should ask a second

pli-tv-kd13:16.1.14.eng: A competent and capable monk should then inform the Sangha:

pli-tv-kd13:16.1.15.eng: ‘Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:16.1.16.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pakkhappaṭicchannaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:16.1.16.eng: The monk Udāyī had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for a half-month. …

pli-tv-kd13:16.1.17.pli: so parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ tissannaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:16.1.17.eng: He’s now completed that probation and is asking the Sangha for the trial period of six days for the three offenses.

pli-tv-kd13:16.1.18.pli: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno tissannaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-kd13:16.1.18.eng: If the Sangha is ready, it should give him that trial period.

pli-tv-kd13:16.1.20.eng: Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:16.1.21.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pakkhappaṭicchannaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:16.1.21.eng: The monk Udāyī had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for a half-month. …

pli-tv-kd13:16.1.22.pli: so parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ tissannaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:16.1.22.eng: He’s now completed that probation and is asking the Sangha for the trial period of six days for the three offenses.

pli-tv-kd13:16.1.23.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno tissannaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ deti.
pli-tv-kd13:16.1.23.eng: The Sangha gives him that trial period.

pli-tv-kd13:16.1.24.pli: Yassāyasmato khamati udāyissa bhikkhuno tissannaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattassa dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd13:16.1.24.eng: Any monk who approves of giving him that trial period of six days should remain silent.

pli-tv-kd13:16.1.25.eng: Any monk who doesn’t approve should speak up.

pli-tv-kd13:16.1.26.eng: For the second time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:16.1.27.eng: For the third time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:16.1.28.pli: Dinnaṃ saṅghena udāyissa bhikkhuno tissannaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:16.1.28.eng: The Sangha has given the monk Udāyī the trial period of six days for the three offenses.

pli-tv-kd13:16.1.29.pli: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:16.1.29.eng: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.’”

pli-tv-kd13:17.1.0.eng: Sending back to the beginning of those undertaking the trial period, etc.

pli-tv-kd13:17.1.1.pli: So mānattaṃ caranto antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:17.1.1.eng: While he was undertaking the trial period, he committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:17.1.3.pli: “ahaṃ, āvuso, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pakkhappaṭicchannaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:17.1.3.eng: “I had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for a half-month. …

pli-tv-kd13:17.1.4.pli: sohaṃ mānattaṃ caranto antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:17.1.4.eng: While undertaking the trial period, I committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:17.1.7.pli: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassitvā purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ datvā chārattaṃ mānattaṃ detu.
pli-tv-kd13:17.1.7.eng: “Well then, the Sangha should send the monk Udāyī back to the beginning for one offense of intentional emission of semen—concealed for five days and committed while undertaking the trial period—and it should then give him probation for that offense simultaneous with probation for the previous offense, and it should then give him the trial period of six days.

pli-tv-kd13:17.1.8.eng: And he should be sent back to the beginning like this. …

pli-tv-kd13:17.1.9.pli: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāso dātabbo …pe….
pli-tv-kd13:17.1.9.eng: And he should be given probation simultaneous with probation for the previous offense like this. …

pli-tv-kd13:17.1.10.pli: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, chārattaṃ mānattaṃ dātabbaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:17.1.10.eng: And he should be given the trial period of six days like this. …

pli-tv-kd13:17.1.12.pli: Dinnaṃ saṅghena udāyissa bhikkhuno antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:17.1.12.eng: The Sangha has given the monk Udāyī the trial period of six days for one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days and committed while undertaking the trial period.

pli-tv-kd13:17.1.13.pli: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:17.1.13.eng: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.’”

pli-tv-kd13:18.1.0.eng: Sending back to the beginning of those deserving rehabilitation, etc.

pli-tv-kd13:18.1.1.pli: So ciṇṇamānatto abbhānāraho antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:18.1.1.eng: When he had completed that trial period, while deserving rehabilitation, he committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:18.1.3.pli: “ahaṃ, āvuso, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pakkhappaṭicchannaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:18.1.3.eng: “I had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for a half-month. …

pli-tv-kd13:18.1.4.pli: sohaṃ ciṇṇamānatto abbhānāraho antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:18.1.4.eng: When I had completed the trial period, while deserving rehabilitation, I committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:18.1.7.pli: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassitvā purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ datvā chārattaṃ mānattaṃ detu.
pli-tv-kd13:18.1.7.eng: “Well then, the Sangha should send the monk Udāyī back to the beginning for one offense of intentional emission of semen—concealed for five days and committed while deserving rehabilitation—and it should then give him probation for that offense simultaneous with probation for the previous offense, and it should then give him the trial period of six days.

pli-tv-kd13:18.1.8.eng: And he should be sent back to the beginning like this. …

pli-tv-kd13:18.1.9.pli: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāso dātabbo …pe….
pli-tv-kd13:18.1.9.eng: And he should be given probation simultaneous with probation for the previous offense like this. …

pli-tv-kd13:18.1.10.pli: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, chārattaṃ mānattaṃ dātabbaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:18.1.10.eng: And he should be given the trial period of six days like this. …

pli-tv-kd13:18.1.12.pli: Dinnaṃ saṅghena udāyissa bhikkhuno antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:18.1.12.eng: The Sangha has given the monk Udāyī the trial period of six days for one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days and committed while deserving rehabilitation.

pli-tv-kd13:18.1.13.pli: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:18.1.13.eng: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.’”

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.0.eng: Rehabilitation of those with offenses concealed for a half-month

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.1.eng: When he had completed that trial period, he told the monks,

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.2.pli: “ahaṃ, āvuso, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pakkhappaṭicchannaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.2.eng: “I had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for a half-month. …

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.3.eng: I’ve now completed the trial period.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.6.pli: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ abbhetu.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.6.eng: “Well then, the Sangha should rehabilitate the monk Udāyī.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.7.eng: And it should be done like this.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.8.pli: Tena, bhikkhave, udāyinā bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā, vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā, ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā, añjaliṃ paggahetvā, evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.8.eng: The monk Udāyī should approach the Sangha, arrange his upper robe over one shoulder, pay respect at the feet of the senior monks, squat on his heels, raise his joined palms, and say:

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.9.pli: ‘ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pakkhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.9.eng: ‘Venerables, I had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for a half-month.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.10.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pakkhappaṭicchannāya pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.10.eng: I asked the Sangha to give me probation for a half-month for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.11.pli: Tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pakkhappaṭicchannāya pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.12.pli: Sohaṃ parivasanto antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.12.eng: While on probation, I committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.13.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.13.eng: I asked the Sangha to send me back to the beginning for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.14.pli: Taṃ maṃ saṅgho antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassi.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.15.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.15.eng: I then asked the Sangha to give me probation for that offense, simultaneous with the probation for the previous offense,

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.16.pli: Tassa me saṅgho antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.17.pli: Sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso mānattāraho antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.17.eng: When I had completed that probation, while deserving the trial period, I committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.18.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.18.eng: I asked the Sangha to send me back to the beginning for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.19.pli: Taṃ maṃ saṅgho antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassi.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.20.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.20.eng: I then asked the Sangha to give me probation for that offense, simultaneous with the probation for the previous offense,

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.21.pli: Tassa me saṅgho antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.22.pli: Sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ tissannaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.22.eng: When I had completed that probation, I asked the Sangha to give me the trial period of six days,

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.23.pli: Tassa me saṅgho tissannaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.24.pli: Sohaṃ mānattaṃ caranto antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.24.eng: While undertaking the trial period, I committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.25.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.25.eng: I asked the Sangha to send me back to the beginning for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.26.pli: Taṃ maṃ saṅgho antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassi.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.27.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.27.eng: I then asked the Sangha to give me probation for that offense, simultaneous with the probation for the previous offense,

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.28.pli: Tassa me saṅgho antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.29.pli: Sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.29.eng: When I had completed that probation, I asked the Sangha to give me the trial period of six days,

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.30.pli: Tassa me saṅgho antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.31.pli: Sohaṃ ciṇṇamānatto abbhānāraho antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.31.eng: When I had completed that trial period, while deserving rehabilitation, I committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.32.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.32.eng: I asked the Sangha to send me back to the beginning for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.33.pli: Taṃ maṃ saṅgho antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassi.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.34.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.34.eng: I then asked the Sangha to give me probation for that offense, simultaneous with the probation for the previous offense,

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.35.pli: Tassa me saṅgho antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.36.pli: Sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.36.eng: When I had completed that probation, I asked the Sangha to give me the trial period of six days,

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.37.pli: Tassa me saṅgho antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.38.pli: Sohaṃ, bhante, ciṇṇamānatto saṅghaṃ abbhānaṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.38.eng: I’ve now completed the trial period and ask the Sangha for rehabilitation.’

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.39.eng: And he should ask a second

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.41.eng: A competent and capable monk should then inform the Sangha:

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.42.eng: ‘Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.43.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pakkhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.43.eng: The monk Udāyī had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for a half-month.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.44.pli: So saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pakkhappaṭicchannāya pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.44.eng: He asked the Sangha to give him probation for a half-month for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.45.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pakkhappaṭicchannāya pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.46.pli: So parivasanto antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.46.eng: While on probation, he committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.47.pli: So saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.47.eng: He asked the Sangha to send him back to the beginning for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.48.pli: Saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassi.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.49.pli: So saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.49.eng: He then asked the Sangha to give him probation for that offense, simultaneous with the probation for the previous offense,

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.50.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.51.pli: So parivutthaparivāso mānattāraho antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.51.eng: When he had completed that probation, while deserving the trial period, he committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.52.pli: So saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.52.eng: He asked the Sangha to send him back to the beginning for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.53.pli: Saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassi.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.54.pli: So saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.54.eng: He then asked the Sangha to give him probation for that offense, simultaneous with the probation for the previous offense,

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.55.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.56.pli: So parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ tissannaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.56.eng: When he had completed that probation, he asked the Sangha to give him the trial period of six days for the three offenses,

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.57.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno tissannaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.58.pli: So mānattaṃ caranto antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.58.eng: While he was undertaking the trial period, he committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.59.pli: So saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.59.eng: He asked the Sangha to send him back to the beginning for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.60.pli: Saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassi.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.61.pli: So saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.61.eng: He then asked the Sangha to give him probation for that offense, simultaneous with the probation for the previous offense,

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.62.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.63.pli: So parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.63.eng: He then asked the Sangha to give him the trial period of six days for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.64.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.65.pli: So ciṇṇamānatto abbhānāraho antarā ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.65.eng: When he had completed that trial period, while deserving rehabilitation, he committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for five days.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.66.pli: So saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.66.eng: He asked the Sangha to send him back to the beginning for that offense,

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.67.pli: Saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya mūlāya paṭikassi.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.68.pli: So saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.68.eng: He then asked the Sangha to give him probation for that offense, simultaneous with the probation for the previous offense,

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.69.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.70.pli: So parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.70.eng: When he had completed that probation, he asked the Sangha to give him the trial period of six days,

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.71.pli: Saṅgho udāyissa bhikkhuno antarā ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā pañcāhappaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.72.eng: He’s now completed that trial period and is asking the Sangha for rehabilitation.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.73.pli: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho udāyiṃ bhikkhuṃ abbheyya.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.73.eng: If the Sangha is ready, it should rehabilitate him.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.75.eng: ‘Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.76.pli: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ pakkhappaṭicchannaṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.76.eng: The monk Udāyī had committed one offense of intentional emission of semen, concealed for a half-month. …

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.77.eng: He’s now completed that trial period and is asking the Sangha for rehabilitation.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.79.pli: Yassāyasmato khamati udāyissa bhikkhuno abbhānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.79.eng: Any monk who approves of rehabilitating him should remain silent.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.80.eng: Any monk who doesn’t approve should speak up.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.81.eng: For the second time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.82.eng: For the third time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.83.eng: The Sangha has rehabilitated the monk Udāyī.

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.84.pli: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:19.1.84.eng: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.’”

pli-tv-kd13:19.1.85.eng: The section on emission of semen is finished.

pli-tv-kd13:20.1.0.2.eng: Simultaneous probations according to the longest duration

pli-tv-kd13:20.1.1.pli: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpanno hoti—
pli-tv-kd13:20.1.1.eng: At one time a monk had committed a number of offenses entailing suspension:

pli-tv-kd13:20.1.2.pli: ekā āpatti ekāhappaṭicchannā, ekā āpatti dvīhappaṭicchannā, ekā āpatti tīhappaṭicchannā, ekā āpatti catūhappaṭicchannā, ekā āpatti pañcāhappaṭicchannā, ekā āpatti chāhappaṭicchannā, ekā āpatti sattāhappaṭicchannā, ekā āpatti aṭṭhāhappaṭicchannā, ekā āpatti navāhappaṭicchannā, ekā āpatti dasāhappaṭicchannā.
pli-tv-kd13:20.1.2.eng: one concealed for one day, one for two days, one for three days, one for four days, one for five days, one for six days, one for seven days, one for eight days, one for nine days, and one for ten days.

pli-tv-kd13:20.1.3.eng: He told the monks about this,

pli-tv-kd13:20.1.9.pli: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho tassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpatti dasāhappaṭicchannā tassā agghena samodhānaparivāsaṃ detu.
pli-tv-kd13:20.1.9.eng: “Well then, the Sangha should give that monk simultaneous probation according to the longest duration, that is, for the offense that was concealed for ten days.

pli-tv-kd13:20.2.1.eng: And it should be given like this.

pli-tv-kd13:20.2.2.eng: That monk should approach the Sangha, arrange his upper robe over one shoulder, pay respect at the feet of the senior monks, squat on his heels, raise his joined palms,

pli-tv-kd13:20.2.4.eng: ‘Venerables, I’ve committed a number of offenses entailing suspension:

pli-tv-kd13:20.2.7.pli: Sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpatti dasāhappaṭicchannā tassā agghena samodhānaparivāsaṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:20.2.7.eng: I ask the Sangha for simultaneous probation according to the longest duration, that is, for the offense that was concealed for ten days.’

pli-tv-kd13:20.2.8.eng: And he should ask a second

pli-tv-kd13:20.2.10.eng: A competent and capable monk should then inform the Sangha:

pli-tv-kd13:20.2.11.eng: ‘Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:20.2.12.pli: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji—
pli-tv-kd13:20.2.12.eng: The monk so-and-so has committed a number of offenses entailing suspension:

pli-tv-kd13:20.2.15.pli: So saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpatti dasāhappaṭicchannā tassā agghena samodhānaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:20.2.15.eng: He’s asking the Sangha for simultaneous probation according to the longest duration, that is, for the offense that was concealed for ten days.

pli-tv-kd13:20.2.16.pli: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpatti dasāhappaṭicchannā tassā agghena samodhānaparivāsaṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-kd13:20.2.16.eng: If the Sangha is ready, it should give him that simultaneous probation.

pli-tv-kd13:20.2.18.eng: Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:20.2.19.pli: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji—
pli-tv-kd13:20.2.19.eng: The monk so-and-so has committed a number of offenses entailing suspension:

pli-tv-kd13:20.2.22.pli: So saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpatti dasāhappaṭicchannā tassā agghena samodhānaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:20.2.22.eng: He’s asking the Sangha for simultaneous probation according to the longest duration, that is, for the offense that was concealed for ten days.

pli-tv-kd13:20.2.23.pli: Saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpatti dasāhappaṭicchannā tassā agghena samodhānaparivāsaṃ deti.
pli-tv-kd13:20.2.23.eng: The Sangha gives him that simultaneous probation.

pli-tv-kd13:20.2.24.pli: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpatti dasāhappaṭicchannā;
pli-tv-kd13:20.2.24.eng: Any monk who approves of giving him

pli-tv-kd13:20.2.25.pli: tassā agghena samodhānaparivāsassa dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd13:20.2.25.eng: that simultaneous probation should remain silent.

pli-tv-kd13:20.2.26.eng: Any monk who doesn’t approve should speak up.

pli-tv-kd13:20.2.27.eng: For the second time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:20.2.28.eng: For the third time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:20.2.29.pli: Dinno saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpatti dasāhappaṭicchannā tassā agghena samodhānaparivāso.
pli-tv-kd13:20.2.29.eng: The Sangha has given monk so-and-so simultaneous probation according to the longest duration, that is, for the offense that was concealed for ten days.

pli-tv-kd13:20.2.30.pli: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:20.2.30.eng: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.’”

pli-tv-kd13:21.1.0.eng: Simultaneous probations according to the longest duration, that is, for all the offenses that were concealed the longest

pli-tv-kd13:21.1.1.pli: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpanno hoti—
pli-tv-kd13:21.1.1.eng: At one time a monk had committed a number of offenses entailing suspension:

pli-tv-kd13:21.1.2.pli: ekā āpatti ekāhappaṭicchannā, dve āpattiyo dvīhappaṭicchannāyo, tisso āpattiyo tīhappaṭicchannāyo, catasso āpattiyo catūhappaṭicchannāyo, pañca āpattiyo pañcāhappaṭicchannāyo, cha āpattiyo chāhappaṭicchannāyo, satta āpattiyo sattāhappaṭicchannāyo, aṭṭha āpattiyo aṭṭhāhappaṭicchannāyo, nava āpattiyo navāhappaṭicchannāyo, dasa āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:21.1.2.eng: one concealed for one day, two for two days, three for three days, four for four days, five for five days, six for six days, seven for seven days, eight for eight days, nine for nine days, ten for ten days.

pli-tv-kd13:21.1.3.eng: He told the monks about this,

pli-tv-kd13:21.1.4.pli: “ahaṃ, āvuso, sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ, ekā āpatti ekāhappaṭicchannā …pe…

pli-tv-kd13:21.1.8.pli: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho tassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo sabbacirappaṭicchannāyo tāsaṃ agghena samodhānaparivāsaṃ detu.
pli-tv-kd13:21.1.8.eng: “Well then, the Sangha should give that monk simultaneous probation according to the longest duration, that is, for all the offenses that were concealed the longest.

pli-tv-kd13:21.1.9.eng: And it should be given like this.

pli-tv-kd13:21.1.10.eng: That monk should approach the Sangha, arrange his upper robe over one shoulder, pay respect at the feet of the senior monks, squat on his heels, raise his joined palms,

pli-tv-kd13:21.1.12.pli: ‘ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ, ekā āpatti ekāhappaṭicchannā …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:21.1.12.eng: ‘Venerables, I’ve committed a number of offenses entailing suspension: one concealed for one day …

pli-tv-kd13:21.1.14.pli: Sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo sabbacirappaṭicchannāyo tāsaṃ agghena samodhānaparivāsaṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:21.1.14.eng: I ask the Sangha for simultaneous probation according to the longest duration, that is, for all the offenses that were concealed the longest.’

pli-tv-kd13:21.1.15.eng: And he should ask a second

pli-tv-kd13:21.1.17.eng: A competent and capable monk should then inform the Sangha:

pli-tv-kd13:21.1.18.eng: ‘Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:21.1.19.pli: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji, ekā āpatti ekāhappaṭicchannā …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:21.1.19.eng: The monk so-and-so has committed a number of offenses entailing suspension: one concealed for one day …

pli-tv-kd13:21.1.21.pli: So saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo sabbacirappaṭicchannāyo tāsaṃ agghena samodhānaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:21.1.21.eng: He’s asking the Sangha for simultaneous probation according to the longest duration, that is, for all the offenses that were concealed the longest.

pli-tv-kd13:21.1.22.pli: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo sabbacirappaṭicchannāyo tāsaṃ agghena samodhānaparivāsaṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-kd13:21.1.22.eng: If the Sangha is ready, it should give him that simultaneous probation.

pli-tv-kd13:21.1.24.eng: Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:21.1.25.pli: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji—
pli-tv-kd13:21.1.25.eng: The monk so-and-so has committed a number of offenses entailing suspension:

pli-tv-kd13:21.1.28.pli: So saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo sabbacirappaṭicchannāyo tāsaṃ agghena samodhānaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:21.1.28.eng: He’s asking the Sangha for simultaneous probation according to the longest duration, that is, for all the offenses that were concealed the longest.

pli-tv-kd13:21.1.29.pli: Saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo sabbacirappaṭicchannāyo tāsaṃ agghena samodhānaparivāsaṃ deti.
pli-tv-kd13:21.1.29.eng: The Sangha gives him that simultaneous probation.

pli-tv-kd13:21.1.30.pli: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo sabbacirappaṭicchannāyo tāsaṃ agghena samodhānaparivāsassa dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd13:21.1.30.eng: Any monk who approves of giving him that simultaneous probation should remain silent.

pli-tv-kd13:21.1.31.eng: Any monk who doesn’t approve should speak up.

pli-tv-kd13:21.1.32.eng: For the second time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:21.1.33.eng: For the third time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:21.1.34.pli: Dinno saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo sabbacirappaṭicchannāyo tāsaṃ agghena samodhānaparivāso.
pli-tv-kd13:21.1.34.eng: The Sangha has given monk so-and-so simultaneous probation according to the longest duration, that is, for all the offenses that were concealed the longest.

pli-tv-kd13:21.1.35.pli: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:21.1.35.eng: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.’”

pli-tv-kd13:22.1.1.pli: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpanno hoti dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:22.1.1.eng: At one time a monk had committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:22.1.3.pli: “ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:22.1.3.eng: “I’ve committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:22.1.4.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:22.1.4.eng: Let me ask the Sangha for probation for two months for one of those offenses.”

pli-tv-kd13:22.1.5.pli: So saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāci.

pli-tv-kd13:22.1.6.pli: Tassa saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:22.1.7.eng: While on probation, he was overcome with guilt.

pli-tv-kd13:22.1.8.pli: “ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:22.1.8.eng: He considered what he had done

pli-tv-kd13:22.1.10.pli: ‘ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.

pli-tv-kd13:22.1.11.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan’ti.

pli-tv-kd13:22.1.12.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.

pli-tv-kd13:22.1.13.pli: Tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:22.1.15.pli: ‘yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ itarissāpi āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan’”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:22.1.15.eng: and thought, “Let me ask the Sangha for probation for two months for the other offense too.”

pli-tv-kd13:22.2.1.eng: He told the monks everything that had happened,

pli-tv-kd13:22.2.2.pli: “ahaṃ, āvuso, dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.

pli-tv-kd13:22.2.4.pli: ‘ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.

pli-tv-kd13:22.2.5.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan’ti.

pli-tv-kd13:22.2.6.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.

pli-tv-kd13:22.2.7.pli: Tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:22.2.9.pli: ‘ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.

pli-tv-kd13:22.2.11.pli: “ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.

pli-tv-kd13:22.2.12.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan”’ti.

pli-tv-kd13:22.2.13.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.

pli-tv-kd13:22.2.14.pli: Tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:22.2.16.pli: ‘yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ itarissāpi āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan’ti.

pli-tv-kd13:22.3.1.pli: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho tassa bhikkhuno itarissāpi āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ detu.
pli-tv-kd13:22.3.1.eng: “Well then, the Sangha should give that monk probation for two months for that offense.

pli-tv-kd13:22.3.2.eng: And it should be given like this.

pli-tv-kd13:22.3.3.pli: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā, vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā, ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā, añjaliṃ paggahetvā, evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd13:22.3.3.eng: That monk should approach the Sangha, arrange his upper robe over one shoulder, pay respect at the feet of the senior monks, squat on his heels, raise his joined palms, and say:

pli-tv-kd13:22.3.4.pli: ‘ahaṃ, bhante, dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:22.3.4.eng: ‘Venerables, I had committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:22.3.6.pli: “ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:22.3.6.eng: “I’ve committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:22.3.7.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:22.3.7.eng: Let me ask the Sangha for probation for two months for one of those offenses.”

pli-tv-kd13:22.3.8.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.

pli-tv-kd13:22.3.9.pli: Tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:22.3.10.eng: While on probation, I was overcome with guilt.

pli-tv-kd13:22.3.11.pli: “ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:22.3.11.eng: I considered what I had done

pli-tv-kd13:22.3.13.pli: ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.

pli-tv-kd13:22.3.14.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan”ti.

pli-tv-kd13:22.3.15.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.

pli-tv-kd13:22.3.16.pli: Tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:22.3.18.pli: “yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ itarissāpi āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:22.3.18.eng: and thought, “Let me ask the Sangha for probation for two months for the other offense too.”

pli-tv-kd13:22.3.19.pli: Sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ itarissāpi āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:22.3.19.eng: And so I ask the Sangha for probation for two months for the other offense, concealed for two months.’

pli-tv-kd13:22.3.20.eng: And he should ask a second

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.1.eng: A competent and capable monk should then inform the Sangha:

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.2.eng: ‘Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.3.pli: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:22.4.3.eng: The monk so-and-so had committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.5.pli: “ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:22.4.5.eng: “I’ve committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.6.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:22.4.6.eng: Let me ask the Sangha for probation for two months for one of those offenses.”

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.7.pli: So saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāci.

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.8.pli: Tassa saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.9.eng: While on probation, he was overcome with guilt.

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.10.pli: “ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:22.4.10.eng: He considered what he had done

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.12.pli: ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.13.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan”ti.

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.14.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.15.pli: Tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.17.pli: “yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ itarissāpi āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:22.4.17.eng: and thought, “Let me ask the Sangha for probation for two months for the other offense too.”

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.18.pli: So saṅghaṃ itarissāpi āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:22.4.18.eng: He’s now asking the Sangha for probation for two months for that other offense.

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.19.pli: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno itarissāpi āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-kd13:22.4.19.eng: If the Sangha is ready, it should give him that probation.

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.21.eng: Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.22.pli: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:22.4.22.eng: The monk so-and-so had committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.24.pli: “ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:22.4.24.eng: “I’ve committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.25.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:22.4.25.eng: Let me ask the Sangha for probation for two months for one of those offenses.”

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.26.pli: So saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāci.

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.27.pli: Tassa saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.28.eng: While on probation, he was overcome with guilt.

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.29.pli: “ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:22.4.29.eng: He considered what he had done

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.31.pli: ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.32.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan”ti.

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.33.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.34.pli: Tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.36.pli: “yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ itarissāpi āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:22.4.36.eng: and thought, “Let me ask the Sangha for probation for two months for the other offense too.”

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.37.pli: So saṅghaṃ itarissāpi āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:22.4.37.eng: He’s now asking the Sangha for probation for two months for that other offense.

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.38.pli: Saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno itarissāpi āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ deti.
pli-tv-kd13:22.4.38.eng: The Sangha gives him that probation.

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.39.pli: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno itarissāpi āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsassa dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd13:22.4.39.eng: Any monk who approves of giving him that probation should remain silent.

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.40.eng: Any monk who doesn’t approve should speak up.

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.41.eng: For the second time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.42.eng: For the third time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.43.pli: Dinno saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno itarissāpi āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāso.
pli-tv-kd13:22.4.43.eng: The Sangha has given monk so-and-so probation for two months for the other offense, concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.44.pli: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:22.4.44.eng: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.’

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.45.pli: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā tadupādāya dve māsā parivasitabbā.
pli-tv-kd13:22.4.45.eng: Starting right there, that monk must stay on probation for two months.”

pli-tv-kd13:23.1.0.eng: Processes for staying on probation for two months

pli-tv-kd13:23.1.1.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:23.1.1.eng: “It may be that a monk has committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:23.1.3.pli: ‘ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:23.1.3.eng: ‘I’ve committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:23.1.4.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:23.1.4.eng: Let me ask the Sangha for probation for two months for one of those offenses.’

pli-tv-kd13:23.1.5.pli: So saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yācati.

pli-tv-kd13:23.1.6.pli: Tassa saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ deti.

pli-tv-kd13:23.1.7.eng: While on probation, he’s overcome with guilt.

pli-tv-kd13:23.1.8.pli: ‘ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.

pli-tv-kd13:23.1.10.pli: “ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.

pli-tv-kd13:23.1.11.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan”ti.

pli-tv-kd13:23.1.12.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.

pli-tv-kd13:23.1.13.pli: Tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:23.1.15.pli: “yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ itarissāpi āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan”’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:23.1.15.eng: and thinks, ‘Let me ask the Sangha for probation for two months for the other offense too.’

pli-tv-kd13:23.1.16.pli: So saṅghaṃ itarissāpi āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yācati.

pli-tv-kd13:23.1.17.pli: Tassa saṅgho itarissāpi āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ deti.

pli-tv-kd13:23.1.18.pli: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā tadupādāya dve māsā parivasitabbā.
pli-tv-kd13:23.1.18.eng: Starting right there, that monk must stay on probation for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:23.2.1.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;
pli-tv-kd13:23.2.1.eng: It may be that a monk has committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:23.2.2.pli: ekaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, ekaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti.
pli-tv-kd13:23.2.2.eng: He’s aware of one, but not the other.

pli-tv-kd13:23.2.3.pli: So saṅghaṃ yaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, tassā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:23.2.3.eng: He asks the Sangha for probation for two months for the offense he’s aware of,

pli-tv-kd13:23.2.4.pli: Tassa saṅgho tassā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ deti.

pli-tv-kd13:23.2.5.eng: While on probation, he finds out about the other offense.

pli-tv-kd13:23.2.7.pli: ‘ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;

pli-tv-kd13:23.2.8.pli: ekaṃ āpattiṃ jāniṃ, ekaṃ āpattiṃ na jāniṃ.

pli-tv-kd13:23.2.9.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ yaṃ āpattiṃ jāniṃ tassā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.

pli-tv-kd13:23.2.10.pli: Tassa me saṅgho tassā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:23.2.12.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ itarissāpi āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:23.2.12.eng: and thinks, ‘Let me ask the Sangha for probation for two months for the other offense too.’

pli-tv-kd13:23.2.13.pli: So saṅghaṃ itarissāpi āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yācati.

pli-tv-kd13:23.2.14.pli: Tassa saṅgho itarissāpi āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ deti.

pli-tv-kd13:23.2.15.pli: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā tadupādāya dve māsā parivasitabbā.
pli-tv-kd13:23.2.15.eng: Starting right there, that monk must stay on probation for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:23.3.1.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;
pli-tv-kd13:23.3.1.eng: It may be that a monk has committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:23.3.2.pli: ekaṃ āpattiṃ sarati, ekaṃ āpattiṃ nassarati.
pli-tv-kd13:23.3.2.eng: He remembers one, but not the other.

pli-tv-kd13:23.3.3.pli: So saṅghaṃ yaṃ āpattiṃ sarati, tassā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:23.3.3.eng: He asks the Sangha for probation for two months for the offense he remembers,

pli-tv-kd13:23.3.4.pli: Tassa saṅgho tassā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ deti.

pli-tv-kd13:23.3.5.eng: While on probation, he remembers the other offense.

pli-tv-kd13:23.3.7.pli: ‘ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;

pli-tv-kd13:23.3.8.pli: ekaṃ āpattiṃ sariṃ, ekaṃ āpattiṃ nassariṃ.

pli-tv-kd13:23.3.9.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ yaṃ āpattiṃ sariṃ, tassā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.

pli-tv-kd13:23.3.10.pli: Tassa me saṅgho tassā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:23.3.12.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ itarissāpi āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:23.3.12.eng: and thinks, ‘Let me ask the Sangha for probation for two months for the other offense too.’

pli-tv-kd13:23.3.13.pli: So saṅghaṃ itarissāpi āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yācati.

pli-tv-kd13:23.3.14.pli: Tassa saṅgho itarissāpi āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ deti.

pli-tv-kd13:23.3.15.pli: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā tadupādāya dve māsā parivasitabbā.
pli-tv-kd13:23.3.15.eng: Starting right there, that monk must stay on probation for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:23.4.1.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;
pli-tv-kd13:23.4.1.eng: It may be that a monk has committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:23.4.2.pli: ekāya āpattiyā nibbematiko, ekāya āpattiyā vematiko.
pli-tv-kd13:23.4.2.eng: He’s sure of one, but unsure of the other.

pli-tv-kd13:23.4.3.pli: So saṅghaṃ yāya āpattiyā nibbematiko, tassā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:23.4.3.eng: He asks the Sangha for probation for two months for the offense he’s sure of,

pli-tv-kd13:23.4.4.pli: Tassa saṅgho tassā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ deti.

pli-tv-kd13:23.4.5.pli: So parivasanto itarissāpi āpattiyā nibbematiko hoti.
pli-tv-kd13:23.4.5.eng: While on probation, he becomes sure of the other offense too.

pli-tv-kd13:23.4.7.pli: ‘ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;

pli-tv-kd13:23.4.8.pli: ekāya āpattiyā nibbematiko, ekāya āpattiyā vematiko.

pli-tv-kd13:23.4.9.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ yāya āpattiyā nibbematiko tassā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.

pli-tv-kd13:23.4.10.pli: Tassa me saṅgho tassā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:23.4.12.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ itarissāpi āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:23.4.12.eng: and thinks, ‘Let me ask the Sangha for probation for two months for the other offense too.’

pli-tv-kd13:23.4.13.pli: So saṅghaṃ itarissāpi āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yācati.

pli-tv-kd13:23.4.14.pli: Tassa saṅgho itarissāpi āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ deti.

pli-tv-kd13:23.4.15.pli: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā tadupādāya dve māsā parivasitabbā.
pli-tv-kd13:23.4.15.eng: Starting right there, that monk must stay on probation for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:23.5.1.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;
pli-tv-kd13:23.5.1.eng: “It may be that a monk has committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:23.5.2.pli: ekā āpatti jānappaṭicchannā, ekā āpatti ajānappaṭicchannā.
pli-tv-kd13:23.5.2.eng: He’s aware he has concealed one offense, but not the other.
pli-tv-kd13:23.5.2.comm: I understand jāna as an adjective qualifying paṭicchannā, in other words, that he knows about the concealing.

pli-tv-kd13:23.5.3.pli: So saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:23.5.3.eng: He asks the Sangha for probation for two months for both offenses,

pli-tv-kd13:23.5.4.pli: Tassa saṅgho tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ deti.

pli-tv-kd13:23.5.5.pli: Tassa parivasantassa añño bhikkhu āgacchati bahussuto āgatāgamo dhammadharo vinayadharo mātikādharo paṇḍito viyatto medhāvī lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo.
pli-tv-kd13:23.5.5.eng: While he’s on probation, another monk arrives. He’s learned, a master of the tradition; he’s an expert on the Teaching, the Monastic Law, and the Key Terms; he’s knowledgeable and competent, has a sense of conscience, and is afraid of wrongdoing and fond of the training.

pli-tv-kd13:23.5.10.pli: ‘ayaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;

pli-tv-kd13:23.5.11.pli: ekā āpatti jānappaṭicchannā, ekā āpatti ajānappaṭicchannā.

pli-tv-kd13:23.5.12.pli: So saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yācati.

pli-tv-kd13:23.5.13.pli: Tassa saṅgho tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:23.5.14.pli: Tāyo ayaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu āpanno, tāsāyaṃ bhikkhu parivasatī’ti.

pli-tv-kd13:23.5.16.pli: ‘yāyaṃ, āvuso, āpatti jānappaṭicchannā, dhammikaṃ tassā āpattiyā parivāsadānaṃ;
pli-tv-kd13:23.5.16.eng: ‘The giving of probation for the offense he’s aware of having concealed is legitimate,

pli-tv-kd13:23.5.18.pli: Yā ca khvāyaṃ, āvuso, āpatti ajānappaṭicchannā, adhammikaṃ tassā āpattiyā parivāsadānaṃ;
pli-tv-kd13:23.5.18.eng: The giving of probation for the offense he’s not aware of having concealed is illegitimate,

pli-tv-kd13:23.5.20.eng: For one offense he only deserves the trial period.’

pli-tv-kd13:23.6.1.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;
pli-tv-kd13:23.6.1.eng: It may be that a monk has committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:23.6.2.pli: ekā āpatti saramānappaṭicchannā, ekā āpatti assaramānappaṭicchannā.
pli-tv-kd13:23.6.2.eng: He remembers concealing one, but not the other.

pli-tv-kd13:23.6.3.pli: So saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:23.6.3.eng: He asks the Sangha for probation for two months for both offenses,

pli-tv-kd13:23.6.4.pli: Tassa saṅgho tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ deti.

pli-tv-kd13:23.6.5.pli: Tassa parivasantassa añño bhikkhu āgacchati bahussuto āgatāgamo dhammadharo vinayadharo mātikādharo paṇḍito viyatto medhāvī lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo.
pli-tv-kd13:23.6.5.eng: While he’s on probation, another monk arrives. He’s learned, a master of the tradition; he’s an expert on the Teaching, the Monastic Law, and the Key Terms; he’s knowledgeable and competent, has a sense of conscience, and is afraid of wrongdoing and fond of the training.

pli-tv-kd13:23.6.10.pli: ‘ayaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;

pli-tv-kd13:23.6.11.pli: ekā āpatti saramānappaṭicchannā, ekā āpatti assaramānappaṭicchannā.

pli-tv-kd13:23.6.12.pli: So saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāci.

pli-tv-kd13:23.6.13.pli: Tassa saṅgho tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:23.6.17.pli: ‘yāyaṃ, āvuso, āpatti saramānappaṭicchannā dhammikaṃ tassā āpattiyā parivāsadānaṃ;
pli-tv-kd13:23.6.17.eng: ‘The giving of probation for the offense he remembers concealing is legitimate,

pli-tv-kd13:23.6.19.pli: Yā ca khvāyaṃ, āvuso, āpatti assaramānappaṭicchannā, adhammikaṃ tassā āpattiyā parivāsadānaṃ;
pli-tv-kd13:23.6.19.eng: The giving of probation for the offense he doesn’t remember concealing is illegitimate,

pli-tv-kd13:23.6.21.eng: For one offense he only deserves the trial period.’

pli-tv-kd13:23.6.22.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;
pli-tv-kd13:23.6.22.eng: It may be that a monk has committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:23.6.23.pli: ekā āpatti nibbematikappaṭicchannā, ekā āpatti vematikappaṭicchannā.
pli-tv-kd13:23.6.23.eng: He’s sure of having concealed one, but unsure of the other.

pli-tv-kd13:23.6.24.pli: So saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:23.6.24.eng: He asks the Sangha for probation for two months for both offenses,

pli-tv-kd13:23.6.25.pli: Tassa saṅgho tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ deti.

pli-tv-kd13:23.6.26.pli: Tassa parivasantassa añño bhikkhu āgacchati bahussuto āgatāgamo dhammadharo vinayadharo mātikādharo paṇḍito viyatto medhāvī lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo.
pli-tv-kd13:23.6.26.eng: While he’s on probation, another monk arrives. He’s learned, a master of the tradition; he’s an expert on the Teaching, the Monastic Law, and the Key Terms; he’s knowledgeable and competent, has a sense of conscience, and is afraid of wrongdoing and fond of the training.

pli-tv-kd13:23.6.31.pli: ‘ayaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;

pli-tv-kd13:23.6.32.pli: ekā āpatti nibbematikappaṭicchannā, ekā āpatti vematikappaṭicchannā.

pli-tv-kd13:23.6.33.pli: So saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāci.

pli-tv-kd13:23.6.34.pli: Tassa saṅgho tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:23.6.38.pli: ‘yāyaṃ, āvuso, āpatti nibbematikappaṭicchannā, dhammikaṃ tassā āpattiyā parivāsadānaṃ;
pli-tv-kd13:23.6.38.eng: ‘The giving of probation for the offense he’s sure of having concealed is legitimate,

pli-tv-kd13:23.6.40.pli: Yā ca khvāyaṃ, āvuso, āpatti vematikappaṭicchannā adhammikaṃ tassā āpattiyā parivāsadānaṃ;
pli-tv-kd13:23.6.40.eng: The giving of probation for the offense he’s unsure of having concealed is illegitimate,

pli-tv-kd13:23.6.42.eng: For one offense he only deserves the trial period.’”

pli-tv-kd13:24.1.1.pli: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpanno hoti dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:24.1.1.eng: At one time a monk committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:24.1.3.pli: “ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:24.1.3.eng: “I’ve committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:24.1.4.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:24.1.4.eng: Let me ask the Sangha for probation for one month for those offenses.”

pli-tv-kd13:24.1.5.pli: So saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ yāci.

pli-tv-kd13:24.1.6.pli: Tassa saṅgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:24.1.7.eng: While on probation, he was overcome with guilt.

pli-tv-kd13:24.1.8.pli: “ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.

pli-tv-kd13:24.1.10.pli: ‘ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.

pli-tv-kd13:24.1.11.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan’ti.

pli-tv-kd13:24.1.12.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.

pli-tv-kd13:24.1.13.pli: Tassa me saṅgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:24.1.15.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāsaṃ yāceyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:24.1.15.eng: and thought, “Let me ask the Sangha for probation for an additional month for those two offenses.”

pli-tv-kd13:24.2.2.pli: “ahaṃ kho, āvuso, dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.

pli-tv-kd13:24.2.4.pli: ‘ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.

pli-tv-kd13:24.2.5.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan’ti.

pli-tv-kd13:24.2.6.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.

pli-tv-kd13:24.2.7.pli: Tassa me saṅgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:24.2.9.pli: ‘ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.

pli-tv-kd13:24.2.11.pli: “ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.

pli-tv-kd13:24.2.12.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan”’ti.

pli-tv-kd13:24.2.13.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.

pli-tv-kd13:24.2.14.pli: Tassa me saṅgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:24.2.16.pli: ‘yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāsaṃ yāceyyan’ti.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.1.pli: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho tassa bhikkhuno dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāsaṃ detu.
pli-tv-kd13:24.3.1.eng: “Well then, the Sangha should give that monk probation for an additional month for those two offenses concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.2.eng: And it should be given like this.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.3.eng: That monk should approach the Sangha, arrange his upper robe over one shoulder, pay respect at the feet of the senior monks, squat on his heels, raise his joined palms,

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.5.pli: ‘ahaṃ, bhante, dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:24.3.5.eng: ‘Venerables, I had committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.7.pli: “ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:24.3.7.eng: “I’ve committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.8.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:24.3.8.eng: Let me ask the Sangha for probation for one month for those offenses.”

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.9.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.10.pli: Tassa me saṅgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.11.eng: While on probation, I was overcome with guilt.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.12.pli: “ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.14.pli: ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.15.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan”ti.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.16.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.17.pli: Tassa me saṅgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.19.pli: “yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāsaṃ yāceyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:24.3.19.eng: and thought, “Let me ask the Sangha for probation for an additional month for those two offenses.”

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.20.pli: Sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāsaṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:24.3.20.eng: I now ask the Sangha for probation for an additional month for those two offenses.’

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.21.eng: And he should ask a second

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.23.eng: A competent and capable monk should then inform the Sangha:

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.24.eng: ‘Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.25.pli: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:24.3.25.eng: The monk so-and-so had committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.27.pli: “ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:24.3.27.eng: “I’ve committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.28.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:24.3.28.eng: Let me ask the Sangha for probation for one month for those offenses.”

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.29.pli: So saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ yāci.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.30.pli: Tassa saṅgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.31.eng: While on probation, he was overcome with guilt.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.32.pli: “ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.34.pli: ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo—

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.35.pli: “yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan”ti.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.36.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.37.pli: Tassa me saṅgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.39.pli: “Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāsaṃ yāceyyan”ti.
