pli-tv-kd13:24.3.39.eng: and thought, “Let me ask the Sangha for probation for an additional month for those two offenses.”

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.40.pli: So saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:24.3.40.eng: He’s now asking the Sangha for probation for an additional month for those two offenses.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.41.pli: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāsaṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-kd13:24.3.41.eng: If the Sangha is ready, it should give him that probation.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.43.eng: Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.44.pli: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:24.3.44.eng: The monk so-and-so had committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.46.pli: “ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:24.3.46.eng: “I’ve committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.47.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:24.3.47.eng: Let me ask the Sangha for probation for one month for those offenses.”

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.48.pli: So saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ yāci.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.49.pli: Tassa saṅgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.50.eng: While on probation, he was overcome with guilt.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.51.pli: “ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.53.pli: ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.54.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan”ti.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.55.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.56.pli: Tassa me saṅgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.58.pli: “yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāsaṃ yāceyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:24.3.58.eng: and thought, “Let me ask the Sangha for probation for an additional month for those two offenses.”

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.59.pli: So saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:24.3.59.eng: He’s now asking the Sangha for probation for an additional month for those two offenses.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.60.pli: Saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāsaṃ deti.
pli-tv-kd13:24.3.60.eng: The Sangha gives him that probation.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.61.pli: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāsassa dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd13:24.3.61.eng: Any monk who approves of giving him that probation should remain silent.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.62.eng: Any monk who doesn’t approve should speak up.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.63.eng: For the second time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.64.eng: For the third time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.65.pli: Dinno saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāso.
pli-tv-kd13:24.3.65.eng: The Sangha has given monk so-and-so probation for an additional month for those two offenses, concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.66.pli: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:24.3.66.eng: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.’

pli-tv-kd13:24.3.67.pli: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā purimaṃ upādāya dve māsā parivasitabbā.
pli-tv-kd13:24.3.67.eng: Counting the previous month, that monk must stay on probation for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:25.1.1.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:25.1.1.eng: “It may be that a monk has committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:25.1.3.pli: ‘ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:25.1.3.eng: ‘I’ve committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:25.1.4.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:25.1.4.eng: Let me ask the Sangha for probation for one month for those offenses.’

pli-tv-kd13:25.1.5.pli: So saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ yācati.

pli-tv-kd13:25.1.6.pli: Tassa saṅgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ deti.

pli-tv-kd13:25.1.7.eng: While on probation, he’s overcome with guilt.

pli-tv-kd13:25.1.8.pli: ‘ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.

pli-tv-kd13:25.1.10.pli: “ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.

pli-tv-kd13:25.1.11.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan”ti.

pli-tv-kd13:25.1.12.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ.

pli-tv-kd13:25.1.13.pli: Tassa me saṅgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ ekamāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:25.1.15.pli: “Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāsaṃ yāceyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd13:25.1.15.eng: and thinks, ‘Let me ask the Sangha for probation for an additional month for those two offenses.’

pli-tv-kd13:25.1.16.pli: So saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāsaṃ yācati.

pli-tv-kd13:25.1.17.pli: Tassa saṅgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāsaṃ deti.

pli-tv-kd13:25.1.18.pli: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā purimaṃ upādāya dve māsā parivasitabbā.
pli-tv-kd13:25.1.18.eng: Counting the previous month, that monk must stay on probation for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.1.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;
pli-tv-kd13:25.2.1.eng: It may be that a monk has committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.2.pli: ekaṃ māsaṃ jānāti, ekaṃ māsaṃ na jānāti.
pli-tv-kd13:25.2.2.eng: He’s aware of one month, but not the other.

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.3.pli: So saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ yaṃ māsaṃ jānāti taṃ māsaṃ parivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:25.2.3.eng: He asks the Sangha for one month probation for the month he’s aware of,

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.4.pli: Tassa saṅgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ yaṃ māsaṃ jānāti taṃ māsaṃ parivāsaṃ deti.

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.5.eng: While on probation, he finds out about the other month.

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.7.pli: ‘ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.8.pli: ekaṃ māsaṃ jāniṃ, ekaṃ māsaṃ na jāniṃ.

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.9.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ yaṃ māsaṃ jāniṃ taṃ māsaṃ parivāsaṃ yāciṃ.

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.10.pli: Tassa me saṅgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ yaṃ māsaṃ jāniṃ taṃ māsaṃ parivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.12.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāsaṃ yāceyyan’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:25.2.12.eng: and thinks, ‘Let me ask the Sangha for probation for an additional month for those two offenses.’

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.13.pli: So saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāsaṃ yācati.

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.14.pli: Tassa saṅgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāsaṃ deti.

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.15.pli: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā purimaṃ upādāya dve māsā parivasitabbā.
pli-tv-kd13:25.2.15.eng: Counting the previous month, that monk must stay on probation for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.16.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;
pli-tv-kd13:25.2.16.eng: It may be that a monk has committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.17.pli: ekaṃ māsaṃ sarati, ekaṃ māsaṃ nassarati.
pli-tv-kd13:25.2.17.eng: He remembers one month, but not the other.

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.18.pli: So saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ yaṃ māsaṃ sarati taṃ māsaṃ parivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:25.2.18.eng: He asks the Sangha for one month probation for the month he remembers,

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.19.pli: Tassa saṅgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ yaṃ māsaṃ sarati taṃ māsaṃ parivāsaṃ deti.

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.20.eng: While on probation, he remembers the other month.

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.22.pli: ‘ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.23.pli: ekaṃ māsaṃ sariṃ, ekaṃ māsaṃ nassariṃ.

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.24.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ yaṃ māsaṃ sariṃ taṃ māsaṃ parivāsaṃ yāciṃ.

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.25.pli: Tassa me saṅgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ yaṃ māsaṃ sariṃ taṃ māsaṃ parivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.27.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāsaṃ yāceyyan’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:25.2.27.eng: and thinks, ‘Let me ask the Sangha for probation for an additional month for those two offenses.’

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.28.pli: So saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāsaṃ yācati.

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.29.pli: Tassa saṅgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāsaṃ deti.

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.30.pli: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā purimaṃ upādāya dve māsā parivasitabbā.
pli-tv-kd13:25.2.30.eng: Counting the previous month, that monk must stay on probation for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.31.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;
pli-tv-kd13:25.2.31.eng: It may be that a monk has committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.32.pli: ekaṃ māsaṃ nibbematiko, ekaṃ māsaṃ vematiko.
pli-tv-kd13:25.2.32.eng: He’s sure of one month, but unsure of the other.

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.33.pli: So saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ yaṃ māsaṃ nibbematiko taṃ māsaṃ parivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:25.2.33.eng: He asks the Sangha for one month probation for the month he’s sure of,

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.34.pli: Tassa saṅgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ yaṃ māsaṃ nibbematiko taṃ māsaṃ parivāsaṃ deti.

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.35.pli: So parivasanto itarampi māsaṃ nibbematiko hoti.
pli-tv-kd13:25.2.35.eng: While on probation, he becomes sure of the other month.

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.37.pli: ‘ahaṃ kho dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.38.pli: ekaṃ māsaṃ nibbematiko, ekaṃ māsaṃ vematiko.

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.39.pli: Sohaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ yaṃ māsaṃ nibbematiko taṃ māsaṃ parivāsaṃ yāciṃ.

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.40.pli: Tassa me saṅgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchānnānaṃ yaṃ māsaṃ nibbematiko taṃ māsaṃ parivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.42.pli: Yannūnāhaṃ saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāsaṃ yāceyyan’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:25.2.42.eng: and thinks, ‘Let me ask the Sangha for probation for an additional month for those two offenses.’

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.43.pli: So saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāsaṃ yācati.

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.44.pli: Tassa saṅgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāsaṃ deti.

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.45.pli: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā purimaṃ upādāya dve māsā parivasitabbā.
pli-tv-kd13:25.2.45.eng: Counting the previous month, that monk must stay on probation for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.1.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.1.eng: “It may be that a monk has committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.2.pli: eko māso jānappaṭicchanno, eko māso ajānappaṭicchanno.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.2.eng: He’s aware of having concealed for one month, but not for the other.

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.3.pli: So saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.3.eng: He asks the Sangha for probation for two months for both offenses,

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.4.pli: Tassa saṅgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ deti.

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.5.pli: Tassa parivasantassa añño bhikkhu āgacchati bahussuto āgatāgamo dhammadharo vinayadharo mātikādharo paṇḍito viyatto medhāvī lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.5.eng: While he’s on probation, another monk arrives. He’s learned, a master of the tradition; he’s an expert on the Teaching, the Monastic Law, and the Key Terms; he’s knowledgeable and competent, has a sense of conscience, and is afraid of wrongdoing and fond of the training.

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.10.pli: ‘ayaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.11.pli: Eko māso jānappaṭicchanno, eko māso ajānappaṭicchanno.

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.12.pli: So saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāci.

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.13.pli: Tassa saṅgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.14.pli: Tāyo ayaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu āpanno tāsāyaṃ bhikkhu parivasatī’ti.

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.16.pli: ‘yvāyaṃ, āvuso, māso jānappaṭicchanno dhammikaṃ tassa māsassa parivāsadānaṃ;
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.16.eng: ‘The giving of probation for the month he’s aware of having concealed is legitimate,

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.18.pli: Yo ca khvāyaṃ, āvuso, māso ajānappaṭicchanno adhammikaṃ tassa māsassa parivāsadānaṃ;
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.18.eng: The giving of probation for the month he’s not aware of having concealed is illegitimate,

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.20.eng: For one month he only deserves the trial period.’

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.21.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.21.eng: It may be that a monk has committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.22.pli: eko māso saramānappaṭicchanno, eko māso assaramānappaṭicchanno.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.22.eng: He remembers concealing for one month, but not for the other.

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.23.pli: So saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.23.eng: He asks the Sangha for probation for two months for both offenses,

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.24.pli: Tassa saṅgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ deti.

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.25.pli: Tassa parivasantassa añño bhikkhu āgacchati bahussuto āgatāgamo dhammadharo vinayadharo mātikādharo paṇḍito viyatto medhāvī lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.25.eng: While he’s on probation, another monk arrives. He’s learned, a master of the tradition; he’s an expert on the Teaching, the Monastic Law, and the Key Terms; he’s knowledgeable and competent, has a sense of conscience, and is afraid of wrongdoing and fond of the training.

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.30.pli: ‘ayaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.31.pli: eko māso saramānappaṭicchanno, eko māso assaramānappaṭicchanno.

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.32.pli: So saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāci.

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.33.pli: Tassa saṅgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.34.pli: Tāyo ayaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu āpanno tāsāyaṃ bhikkhu parivasatī’ti.

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.36.pli: ‘yvāyaṃ, āvuso, māso saramānappaṭicchanno dhammikaṃ tassa māsassa parivāsadānaṃ;
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.36.eng: ‘The giving of probation for the month he remembers concealing is legitimate,

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.38.pli: Yo ca khvāyaṃ, āvuso, māso assaramānappaṭicchanno adhammikaṃ tassa māsassa parivāsadānaṃ;
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.38.eng: The giving of probation for the month he doesn’t remember concealing is illegitimate,

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.40.eng: For one month he only deserves the trial period.’

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.41.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.41.eng: It may be that a monk has committed two offenses entailing suspension, both concealed for two months.

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.42.pli: eko māso nibbematikappaṭicchanno, eko māso vematikappaṭicchanno.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.42.eng: He’s sure of having concealed for one month, but unsure of the other.

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.43.pli: So saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.43.eng: He asks the Sangha for probation for two months for both offenses,

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.44.pli: Tassa saṅgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ deti.

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.45.pli: Tassa parivasantassa añño bhikkhu āgacchati bahussuto āgatāgamo dhammadharo vinayadharo mātikādharo paṇḍito viyatto medhāvī lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.45.eng: While he’s on probation, another monk arrives. He’s learned, a master of the tradition; he’s an expert on the Teaching, the Monastic Law, and the Key Terms; he’s knowledgeable and competent, has a sense of conscience, and is afraid of wrongdoing and fond of the training.

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.50.pli: ‘ayaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu dve saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.51.pli: eko māso nibbematikappaṭicchanno, eko māso vematikappaṭicchanno.

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.52.pli: So saṅghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāci.

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.53.pli: Tassa saṅgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.54.pli: Tāyo ayaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu āpanno tāsāyaṃ bhikkhu parivasatī’ti.

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.56.pli: ‘yvāyaṃ, āvuso, māso nibbematikappaṭicchanno dhammikaṃ tassa māsassa parivāsadānaṃ;
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.56.eng: ‘The giving of probation for the month he’s sure of having concealed is legitimate,

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.58.pli: Yo ca khvāyaṃ, āvuso, māso vematikappaṭicchanno adhammikaṃ tassa māsassa parivāsadānaṃ;
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.58.eng: The giving of probation for the month he’s unsure of having concealed is illegitimate,

pli-tv-kd13:25.3.60.eng: For one month he only deserves the trial period.’”

pli-tv-kd13:26.1.1.pli: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpanno hoti.
pli-tv-kd13:26.1.1.eng: At one time a monk had committed a number of offenses entailing suspension.

pli-tv-kd13:26.1.2.eng: He did not know the number of offenses

pli-tv-kd13:26.1.4.eng: he did not remember the number of offenses or the number of days;

pli-tv-kd13:26.1.5.eng: he was unsure of the number of offenses and the number of days.

pli-tv-kd13:26.1.6.eng: He told the monks about this,

pli-tv-kd13:26.1.8.pli: āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāmi, rattipariyantaṃ na jānāmi;

pli-tv-kd13:26.1.13.pli: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho tassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ detu.
pli-tv-kd13:26.1.13.eng: “Well then, the Sangha should give that monk a purifying probation for those offenses.

pli-tv-kd13:26.2.1.eng: And it should be given like this.

pli-tv-kd13:26.2.2.eng: That monk should approach the Sangha, arrange his upper robe over one shoulder, pay respect at the feet of the senior monks, squat on his heels, raise his joined palms,

pli-tv-kd13:26.2.4.eng: ‘Venerables, I’ve committed a number of offenses entailing suspension.

pli-tv-kd13:26.2.5.pli: Āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāmi, rattipariyantaṃ na jānāmi;
pli-tv-kd13:26.2.5.eng: I don’t know the number of offenses or the number of days;

pli-tv-kd13:26.2.6.eng: I don’t remember the number of offenses or the number of days;

pli-tv-kd13:26.2.7.eng: I’m unsure of the number of offenses and the number of days.

pli-tv-kd13:26.2.8.pli: Sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:26.2.8.eng: I ask the Sangha for a purifying probation for those offenses.’

pli-tv-kd13:26.2.9.eng: And he should ask a second

pli-tv-kd13:26.2.11.eng: A competent and capable monk should then inform the Sangha:

pli-tv-kd13:26.2.12.eng: ‘Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:26.2.13.pli: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji.
pli-tv-kd13:26.2.13.eng: The monk so-and-so has committed a number of offenses entailing suspension.

pli-tv-kd13:26.2.14.pli: Āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāti, rattipariyantaṃ na jānāti;
pli-tv-kd13:26.2.14.eng: He doesn’t know the number of offenses or the number of days;

pli-tv-kd13:26.2.15.eng: he doesn’t remember the number of offenses or the number of days;

pli-tv-kd13:26.2.16.eng: he’s unsure of the number of offenses and the number of days.

pli-tv-kd13:26.2.17.pli: So saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:26.2.17.eng: He’s asking the Sangha for a purifying probation for those offenses.

pli-tv-kd13:26.2.18.pli: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-kd13:26.2.18.eng: If the Sangha is ready, it should give him a that purifying probation.

pli-tv-kd13:26.2.20.eng: Please, venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-kd13:26.2.21.pli: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji.
pli-tv-kd13:26.2.21.eng: The monk so-and-so has committed a number of offenses entailing suspension.

pli-tv-kd13:26.2.22.pli: Āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāti, rattipariyantaṃ na jānāti;
pli-tv-kd13:26.2.22.eng: He doesn’t know the number of offenses or the number of days;

pli-tv-kd13:26.2.23.eng: he doesn’t remember the number of offenses or the number of days;

pli-tv-kd13:26.2.24.eng: he’s unsure of the number of offenses and the number of days.

pli-tv-kd13:26.2.25.pli: So saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:26.2.25.eng: He’s asking the Sangha for purifying probation for those offenses.

pli-tv-kd13:26.2.26.pli: Saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ deti.
pli-tv-kd13:26.2.26.eng: The Sangha gives him that purifying probation.

pli-tv-kd13:26.2.27.pli: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsassa dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd13:26.2.27.eng: Any monk who approves of giving him that purifying probation should remain silent.

pli-tv-kd13:26.2.28.eng: Any monk who doesn’t approve should speak up.

pli-tv-kd13:26.2.29.eng: For the second time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:26.2.30.eng: For the third time, I speak on this matter. …

pli-tv-kd13:26.2.31.pli: Dinno saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāso.
pli-tv-kd13:26.2.31.eng: The Sangha has given monk so-and-so a purifying probation for those offenses.

pli-tv-kd13:26.2.32.pli: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:26.2.32.eng: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.’

pli-tv-kd13:26.3.2.pli: Āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāti, rattipariyantaṃ na jānāti;
pli-tv-kd13:26.3.2.eng: It should be given: when one doesn’t know the number of offenses, nor the number of days;

pli-tv-kd13:26.3.3.eng: when one doesn’t remember the number of offenses, nor the number of days;

pli-tv-kd13:26.3.4.eng: when one is unsure of the number of offenses and the number of days.

pli-tv-kd13:26.3.6.eng: It should be given: when one knows the number of offenses, but not the number of days;

pli-tv-kd13:26.3.7.eng: when one remembers the number of offenses, but not the number of days;

pli-tv-kd13:26.3.8.eng: when one is sure of the number of offenses, but not the number of days.

pli-tv-kd13:26.3.10.pli: Āpattipariyantaṃ ekaccaṃ jānāti, ekaccaṃ na jānāti, rattipariyantaṃ na jānāti;
pli-tv-kd13:26.3.10.eng: It should be given: when one knows some of the offenses but not others, and not the number of days;

pli-tv-kd13:26.3.11.pli: āpattipariyantaṃ ekaccaṃ sarati, ekaccaṃ nassarati, rattipariyantaṃ nassarati;
pli-tv-kd13:26.3.11.eng: when one remembers some of the offenses but not others, and not the number of days;

pli-tv-kd13:26.3.12.pli: āpattipariyante ekacce vematiko, ekacce nibbematiko, rattipariyante vematiko—
pli-tv-kd13:26.3.12.eng: when one is sure of some of the offenses but not others, and not the number of days.

pli-tv-kd13:26.3.14.pli: Āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāti, rattipariyantaṃ ekaccaṃ jānāti, ekaccaṃ na jānāti;
pli-tv-kd13:26.3.14.eng: It should be given: when one doesn’t know the number of offenses, but one knows some of the days but not others;

pli-tv-kd13:26.3.15.pli: āpattipariyantaṃ nassarati, rattipariyantaṃ ekaccaṃ sarati, ekaccaṃ nassarati;
pli-tv-kd13:26.3.15.eng: when one doesn’t remember the number of offenses, but one remembers some of the days but not others;

pli-tv-kd13:26.3.16.pli: āpattipariyante vematiko, rattipariyante ekacce vematiko, ekacce nibbematiko—
pli-tv-kd13:26.3.16.eng: when one is unsure of the number of offenses, but one is sure of some of the days but not others.

pli-tv-kd13:26.3.18.pli: Āpattipariyantaṃ jānāti, rattipariyantaṃ ekaccaṃ jānāti, ekaccaṃ na jānāti;
pli-tv-kd13:26.3.18.eng: It should be given: when one knows the number of offenses, and one knows some of the days but not others;

pli-tv-kd13:26.3.19.pli: āpattipariyantaṃ sarati, rattipariyantaṃ ekaccaṃ sarati, ekaccaṃ nassarati;
pli-tv-kd13:26.3.19.eng: when one remembers the number of offenses, and one remembers some of the days but not others;

pli-tv-kd13:26.3.20.pli: āpattipariyante nibbematiko, rattipariyante ekacce vematiko, ekacce nibbematiko—
pli-tv-kd13:26.3.20.eng: when one is sure of the number of offenses, and one is sure of some of the days but not others.

pli-tv-kd13:26.3.22.pli: Āpattipariyantaṃ ekaccaṃ jānāti, ekaccaṃ na jānāti;
pli-tv-kd13:26.3.22.eng: It should be given: when one knows some of the offenses but not others,

pli-tv-kd13:26.3.23.pli: rattipariyantaṃ ekaccaṃ jānāti, ekaccaṃ na jānāti;
pli-tv-kd13:26.3.23.eng: and one knows some of the days but not others;

pli-tv-kd13:26.3.24.eng: when one remembers some of the offenses but not others,

pli-tv-kd13:26.3.25.eng: and one remembers some of the days but not others;

pli-tv-kd13:26.3.26.eng: when one is sure of some of the offenses but not others,

pli-tv-kd13:26.3.27.eng: and one is sure of some of the days but not others.”

pli-tv-kd13:26.4.2.eng: It should be given: when one knows the number of offenses and the number of days;

pli-tv-kd13:26.4.3.eng: when one remembers the number of offenses and the number of days;

pli-tv-kd13:26.4.4.eng: when one is sure of the number of offenses and the number of days.

pli-tv-kd13:26.4.6.eng: It should be given: when one doesn’t know the number of offenses, but one knows the number of days;

pli-tv-kd13:26.4.7.eng: when one doesn’t remember the number of offenses, but one remembers the number of days;

pli-tv-kd13:26.4.8.eng: when one is unsure of the number of offenses, but sure of the number of days.

pli-tv-kd13:26.4.10.pli: Āpattipariyantaṃ ekaccaṃ jānāti, ekaccaṃ na jānāti, rattipariyantaṃ jānāti;
pli-tv-kd13:26.4.10.eng: It should be given: when one knows some of the offenses but not others, and one knows the number of days;

pli-tv-kd13:26.4.11.pli: āpattipariyantaṃ ekaccaṃ sarati, ekaccaṃ nassarati, rattipariyantaṃ sarati;
pli-tv-kd13:26.4.11.eng: when one remembers some of the offenses but not others, and one remembers the number of days;

pli-tv-kd13:26.4.12.pli: āpattipariyante ekacce vematiko, ekacce nibbematiko, rattipariyante nibbematiko—
pli-tv-kd13:26.4.12.eng: when one is sure of some of the offenses but not others, and one is sure of the number of days.”

pli-tv-kd13:26.4.15.eng: The section on probation is finished.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.1.pli: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu parivasanto vibbhami.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.1.eng: At one time a monk on probation disrobed.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.1.comm: For an explanation of the rendering “disrobe” for vibbhamati, see Appendix of Technical Terms.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.2.pli: So puna paccāgantvā bhikkhū upasampadaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.2.eng: He then came back and asked the monks for the full ordination.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.4.eng: “It may be, monks, that a monk on probation disrobes.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.5.eng: For one who’s disrobed, the probation is suspended.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.6.pli: So ce puna upasampajjati, tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.6.eng: If he’s given the full ordination again, he continues the previous probationary process right away.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.7.pli: Yo parivāso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho, avaseso parivasitabbo.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.7.eng: The probation that was given is valid. The probation he’s already undertaken is valid. And the remainder is to be undertaken.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.8.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto sāmaṇero hoti.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.8.eng: It may be that a monk on probation becomes a novice monk.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.9.eng: For a novice monk, the probation is suspended.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.10.pli: So ce puna upasampajjati, tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.10.eng: If he’s given the full ordination again, he continues the previous probationary process right away.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.11.pli: Yo parivāso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho, avaseso parivasitabbo.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.11.eng: The probation that was given is valid. The probation he’s already undertaken is valid. And the remainder is to be undertaken.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.12.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto ummattako hoti.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.12.eng: It may be that a monk on probation goes insane.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.13.eng: For one who’s insane, the probation is suspended.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.14.pli: So ce puna anummattako hoti, tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.14.eng: If he regains his sanity, he continues the previous probationary process right away.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.15.pli: Yo parivāso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho, avaseso parivasitabbo.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.15.eng: The probation that was given is valid. The probation he’s already undertaken is valid. And the remainder is to be undertaken.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.16.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto khittacitto hoti.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.16.eng: It may be that a monk on probation becomes deranged.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.17.eng: For one who’s deranged, the probation is suspended.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.18.pli: So ce puna akhittacitto hoti, tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.18.eng: If he regains his sanity, he continues the previous probationary process right away.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.19.pli: Yo parivāso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho, avaseso parivasitabbo.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.19.eng: The probation that was given is valid. The probation he’s already undertaken is valid. And the remainder is to be undertaken.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.20.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto vedanāṭṭo hoti.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.20.eng: It may be that a monk on probation is overwhelmed by pain.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.21.eng: For one who’s overwhelmed by pain, the probation is suspended.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.22.pli: So ce puna avedanāṭṭo hoti, tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.22.eng: If he recovers, he continues the previous probationary process right away.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.23.pli: Yo parivāso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho, avaseso parivasitabbo.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.23.eng: The probation that was given is valid. The probation he’s already undertaken is valid. And the remainder is to be undertaken.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.24.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhipiyyati.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.24.eng: It may be that a monk on probation is ejected for not recognizing an offense.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.25.eng: For one who’s ejected, the probation is suspended.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.26.pli: So ce puna osāriyyati, tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.26.eng: If he’s readmitted, he continues the previous probationary process right away.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.27.pli: Yo parivāso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho, avaseso parivasitabbo.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.27.eng: The probation that was given is valid. The probation he’s already undertaken is valid. And the remainder is to be undertaken.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.28.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhipiyyati.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.28.eng: It may be that a monk on probation is ejected for not making amends for an offense.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.29.eng: For one who’s ejected, the probation is suspended.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.30.pli: So ce puna osāriyyati, tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.30.eng: If he’s readmitted, he continues the previous probationary process right away.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.31.pli: Yo parivāso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho, avaseso parivasitabbo.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.31.eng: The probation that was given is valid. The probation he’s already undertaken is valid. And the remainder is to be undertaken.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.32.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā, appaṭinissagge, ukkhipiyyati.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.32.eng: It may be that a monk on probation is ejected for not giving up a bad view.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.33.eng: For one who’s ejected, the probation is suspended.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.34.pli: So ce puna osāriyyati, tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.34.eng: If he’s readmitted, he continues the previous probationary process right away.

pli-tv-kd13:27.1.35.pli: Yo parivāso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho, avaseso parivasitabbo.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.35.eng: The probation that was given is valid. The probation he’s already undertaken is valid. And the remainder is to be undertaken.”

pli-tv-kd13:27.2.1.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mūlāyapaṭikassanāraho vibbhamati.
pli-tv-kd13:27.2.1.eng: “It may be that a monk deserving to be sent back to the beginning disrobes.

pli-tv-kd13:27.2.2.eng: For one who’s disrobed, the sending back to the beginning is suspended.

pli-tv-kd13:27.2.3.pli: So ce puna upasampajjati, tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.2.3.eng: If he’s given the full ordination again, he continues the previous probationary process right away.

pli-tv-kd13:27.2.4.pli: Yo parivāso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho.
pli-tv-kd13:27.2.4.eng: The probation that was given is valid. The probation he’s already undertaken is valid.

pli-tv-kd13:27.2.5.eng: And he’s to be sent back to the beginning.

pli-tv-kd13:27.2.6.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mūlāyapaṭikassanāraho sāmaṇero hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:27.2.6.eng: It may be that a monk deserving to be sent back to the beginning becomes a novice monk,

pli-tv-kd13:27.2.10.eng: is ejected for not recognizing an offense,

pli-tv-kd13:27.2.11.eng: is ejected for not making amends for an offense,

pli-tv-kd13:27.2.12.eng: or is ejected for not giving up a bad view.

pli-tv-kd13:27.2.13.eng: For one who’s ejected, the sending back to the beginning is suspended.

pli-tv-kd13:27.2.14.pli: So ce puna osāriyyati, tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.2.14.eng: If he’s readmitted, he continues the previous probationary process right away.

pli-tv-kd13:27.2.15.eng: The probation that was given is valid. The probation he’s already undertaken is valid.

pli-tv-kd13:27.2.16.eng: And he’s to be sent back to the beginning.”

pli-tv-kd13:27.3.5.eng: And he’s to be given the trial period.

pli-tv-kd13:27.3.6.eng: It may be that a monk deserving the trial period becomes a novice monk,

pli-tv-kd13:27.3.14.eng: If he’s readmitted, he continues the previous probationary process right away.

pli-tv-kd13:27.3.15.eng: The probation that was given is valid. The probation he’s undertaken is valid.

pli-tv-kd13:27.3.16.eng: And he’s to be given the trial period.”

pli-tv-kd13:27.4.1.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mānattaṃ caranto vibbhamati.
pli-tv-kd13:27.4.1.eng: “It may be that a monk undertaking the trial period disrobes.

pli-tv-kd13:27.4.2.eng: For one who’s disrobed, the trial period is suspended.

pli-tv-kd13:27.4.3.pli: So ce puna upasampajjati tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.4.3.eng: If he’s given the full ordination again, he continues the previous probationary process right away.

pli-tv-kd13:27.4.4.eng: The probation that was given is valid. The probation he’s undertaken is valid.

pli-tv-kd13:27.4.5.pli: yaṃ mānattaṃ dinnaṃ sudinnaṃ, yaṃ mānattaṃ ciṇṇaṃ suciṇṇaṃ, avasesaṃ caritabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.4.5.eng: The trial period that was given is valid. The trial period he’s already undertaken is valid. And the remainder is to be undertaken.

pli-tv-kd13:27.4.6.eng: It may be that a monk undertaking the trial period becomes a novice monk,

pli-tv-kd13:27.4.11.eng: is ejected for not making amends for an offense,

pli-tv-kd13:27.4.12.eng: or is ejected for not giving up a bad view.

pli-tv-kd13:27.4.13.eng: For one who’s ejected, the trial period is suspended.

pli-tv-kd13:27.4.14.eng: If he’s readmitted, he continues the previous probationary process right away.

pli-tv-kd13:27.4.15.pli: Yo parivāso dinno sudinno, yo purivuttho suparivuttho;
pli-tv-kd13:27.4.15.eng: The probation that was given is valid. The probation he’s undertaken is valid.

pli-tv-kd13:27.4.16.pli: yaṃ mānattaṃ dinnaṃ sudinnaṃ, yaṃ mānattaṃ ciṇṇaṃ suciṇṇaṃ, avasesaṃ caritabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.4.16.eng: The trial period that was given is valid. The trial period he’s undertaken is valid. And the remainder is to be undertaken.”

pli-tv-kd13:27.5.1.eng: “It may be that a monk deserving rehabilitation disrobes.

pli-tv-kd13:27.5.2.eng: For one who’s disrobed, the rehabilitation is suspended.

pli-tv-kd13:27.5.4.eng: The probation that was given is valid. The probation he’s undertaken is valid.

pli-tv-kd13:27.5.5.pli: yaṃ mānattaṃ dinnaṃ sudinnaṃ, yaṃ mānattaṃ ciṇṇaṃ suciṇṇaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.5.5.eng: The trial period that was given is valid. The trial period he’s undertaken is valid.

pli-tv-kd13:27.5.7.eng: It may be that a monk deserving rehabilitation becomes a novice monk,

pli-tv-kd13:27.5.11.eng: is ejected for not recognizing an offense,

pli-tv-kd13:27.5.12.eng: is ejected for not making amends for an offense,

pli-tv-kd13:27.5.13.eng: or is ejected for not giving up a bad view.

pli-tv-kd13:27.5.14.eng: For one who’s ejected, the rehabilitation is suspended.

pli-tv-kd13:27.5.15.eng: If he’s readmitted, he continues the previous probationary process right away.

pli-tv-kd13:27.5.16.pli: Yo parivāso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho;
pli-tv-kd13:27.5.16.eng: The probation that was given is valid. The probation he’s undertaken is valid.

pli-tv-kd13:27.5.17.pli: yaṃ mānattaṃ dinnaṃ sudinnaṃ, yaṃ mānattaṃ ciṇṇaṃ suciṇṇaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.5.17.eng: The trial period that was given is valid. The trial period he’s undertaken is valid.

pli-tv-kd13:27.5.19.eng: The group of forty is finished.

pli-tv-kd13:28.1.1.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto antarā sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati parimāṇā appaṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:28.1.1.eng: “It may be that a monk on probation commits a number of offenses entailing suspension, unconcealed and specified.
pli-tv-kd13:28.1.1.comm: “Specified” renders parimāṇā, literally, “limited”. Sp 4.165: Tattha “antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjati parimāṇā appaṭicchannāyo”tiādīsu āpattiparicchedavasena parimāṇāyo ceva appaṭicchannāyo cāti attho, “Here the meaning of antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjati parimāṇā appaṭicchannāyo, etc., is that they are specified and unconcealed on account of the offenses being determined.”

pli-tv-kd13:28.1.2.eng: He’s to be sent back to the beginning.

pli-tv-kd13:28.1.3.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto antarā sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati parimāṇā paṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:28.1.3.eng: It may be that a monk on probation commits a number of offenses entailing suspension, concealed and specified.

pli-tv-kd13:28.1.4.eng: He’s to be sent back to the beginning.

pli-tv-kd13:28.1.5.pli: Yathāpaṭicchannānañcassa āpattīnaṃ purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāso dātabbo.
pli-tv-kd13:28.1.5.eng: He should then be given probation according to the length of the concealment of those offenses and simultaneously with the probation for the previous offense.

pli-tv-kd13:28.1.6.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto antarā sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati parimāṇā paṭicchannāyopi appaṭicchannāyopi.
pli-tv-kd13:28.1.6.eng: It may be that a monk on probation commits a number of offenses entailing suspension, both concealed and unconcealed and specified.

pli-tv-kd13:28.1.7.eng: He’s to be sent back to the beginning.

pli-tv-kd13:28.1.8.pli: Yathāpaṭicchannānañcassa āpattīnaṃ purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāso dātabbo.
pli-tv-kd13:28.1.8.eng: He should then be given probation according to the length of the concealment of those offenses and simultaneously with the probation for the previous offense.

pli-tv-kd13:28.1.9.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto antarā sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati aparimāṇā appaṭicchannāyo …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:28.1.9.eng: It may be that a monk on probation commits a number of offenses entailing suspension, unconcealed and unspecified …

pli-tv-kd13:28.1.11.eng: both concealed and unconcealed and unspecified …

pli-tv-kd13:28.1.12.eng: unconcealed and both specified and unspecified …

pli-tv-kd13:28.1.13.eng: concealed and both specified and unspecified …

pli-tv-kd13:28.1.14.eng: both concealed and unconcealed and both specified and unspecified.

pli-tv-kd13:28.1.15.eng: He’s to be sent back to the beginning.

pli-tv-kd13:28.1.16.pli: Yathāpaṭicchannānañcassa āpattīnaṃ purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāso dātabbo.
pli-tv-kd13:28.1.16.eng: He should then be given probation according to the length of the concealment of those offenses and simultaneously with the probation for the previous offense.

pli-tv-kd13:28.2.1.eng: It may be that a monk who deserves the trial period …

pli-tv-kd13:28.2.4.pli: abbhānāraho antarā sambahulā saṅghādisesā, āpattiyo āpajjati parimāṇā appaṭicchannāyo …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:28.2.4.eng: who deserves rehabilitation commits a number of offenses entailing suspension, unconcealed and specified …

pli-tv-kd13:28.2.6.eng: both concealed and unconcealed and specified …

pli-tv-kd13:28.2.9.eng: both concealed and unconcealed and unspecified …

pli-tv-kd13:28.2.10.eng: unconcealed and both specified and unspecified …

pli-tv-kd13:28.2.11.eng: concealed and both specified and unspecified …

pli-tv-kd13:28.2.12.eng: both concealed and unconcealed and both specified and unspecified.

pli-tv-kd13:28.2.13.eng: He’s to be sent back to the beginning.

pli-tv-kd13:28.2.14.pli: Yathāpaṭicchannānañcassa āpattīnaṃ purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāso dātabbo.
pli-tv-kd13:28.2.14.eng: He should then be given probation according to the length of the concealment of those offenses and simultaneously with the probation for the previous offense.”

pli-tv-kd13:28.2.15.eng: The group of thirty-six is finished.

pli-tv-kd13:29.1.0.eng: 5. The group of one hundred on the trial period

pli-tv-kd13:29.1.1.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjitvā appaṭicchādetvā vibbhamati.
pli-tv-kd13:29.1.1.eng: “It may be that a monk commits a number of unconcealed offenses entailing suspension and then disrobes.

pli-tv-kd13:29.1.2.pli: So puna upasampanno tā āpattiyo nacchādeti.
pli-tv-kd13:29.1.2.eng: Being reordained, he doesn’t conceal them.

pli-tv-kd13:29.1.3.eng: He should be given the trial period.

pli-tv-kd13:29.1.4.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjitvā appaṭicchādetvā vibbhamati.
pli-tv-kd13:29.1.4.eng: It may be that a monk commits a number of unconcealed offenses entailing suspension and then disrobes.

pli-tv-kd13:29.1.5.pli: So puna upasampanno tā āpattiyo chādeti.

pli-tv-kd13:29.1.6.pli: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pacchimasmiṃ āpattikkhandhe yathāpaṭicchanne parivāsaṃ datvā mānattaṃ dātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:29.1.6.eng: He should be given probation according to the length of the subsequent concealment of those offenses, and he should then be given the trial period.
pli-tv-kd13:29.1.6.comm: Sp 4.166: Pacchimasmiṁ āpattikkhandheti ekova so āpattikkhandho, pacchā chāditattā pana “pacchimasmiṁ āpattikkhandhe”ti vuttaṁ. Purimasminti etthāpi eseva nayo, “Pacchimasmiṁ āpattikkhandhe: there is just one group of offenses. But since it is concealed subsequently, it is called pacchimasmiṁ āpattikkhandhe.” The word “group” is redundant on translation.

pli-tv-kd13:29.1.7.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjitvā paṭicchādetvā vibbhamati.
pli-tv-kd13:29.1.7.eng: It may be that a monk commits a number of concealed offenses entailing suspension and then disrobes.

pli-tv-kd13:29.1.8.pli: So puna upasampanno tā āpattiyo nacchādeti.
pli-tv-kd13:29.1.8.eng: Being reordained, he doesn’t conceal them.

pli-tv-kd13:29.1.9.pli: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno purimasmiṃ āpattikkhandhe yathāpaṭicchanne parivāsaṃ datvā mānattaṃ dātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:29.1.9.eng: He should be given probation according to the length of the earlier concealment of those offenses, and he should then be given the trial period.

pli-tv-kd13:29.1.10.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjitvā paṭicchādetvā vibbhamati.
pli-tv-kd13:29.1.10.eng: It may be that a monk commits a number of concealed offenses entailing suspension and then disrobes.

pli-tv-kd13:29.1.11.pli: So puna upasampanno tā āpattiyo chādeti.

pli-tv-kd13:29.1.12.pli: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno purimasmiñca pacchimasmiñca āpattikkhandhe yathāpaṭicchanne parivāsaṃ datvā mānattaṃ dātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:29.1.12.eng: He should be given probation according to the length of the earlier and subsequent concealment of those offenses, and he should then be given the trial period.

pli-tv-kd13:29.2.1.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-kd13:29.2.1.eng: “It may be that a monk commits a number of offenses entailing suspension,

pli-tv-kd13:29.2.3.pli: So vibbhamitvā puna upasampanno yā āpattiyo pubbe chādesi tā āpattiyo pacchā nacchādeti;
pli-tv-kd13:29.2.3.eng: and then disrobes. Being reordained, he doesn’t conceal any of them.

pli-tv-kd13:29.2.4.pli: yā āpattiyo pubbe nacchādesi tā āpattiyo pacchā nacchādeti.

pli-tv-kd13:29.2.5.pli: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno purimasmiṃ āpattikkhandhe yathāpaṭicchanne parivāsaṃ datvā mānattaṃ dātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:29.2.5.eng: He should be given probation according to the length of the earlier concealment of those offenses, and he should then be given the trial period.

pli-tv-kd13:29.2.6.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-kd13:29.2.6.eng: It may be that a monk commits a number of offenses entailing suspension,

pli-tv-kd13:29.2.8.pli: So vibbhamitvā puna upasampanno yā āpattiyo pubbe chādesi tā āpattiyo pacchā nacchādeti;
pli-tv-kd13:29.2.8.eng: and then disrobes. Being reordained, he doesn’t conceal those offenses he previously concealed,

pli-tv-kd13:29.2.9.pli: yā āpattiyo pubbe nacchādesi tā āpattiyo pacchā chādeti.
pli-tv-kd13:29.2.9.eng: but conceals those offenses he previously didn’t conceal.

pli-tv-kd13:29.2.10.pli: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno purimasmiñca pacchimasmiñca āpattikkhandhe yathāpaṭicchanne parivāsaṃ datvā mānattaṃ dātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:29.2.10.eng: He should be given probation according to the length of the earlier and subsequent concealment of those offenses, and he should then be given the trial period.

pli-tv-kd13:29.2.11.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-kd13:29.2.11.eng: It may be that a monk commits a number of offenses entailing suspension,

pli-tv-kd13:29.2.13.pli: So vibbhamitvā puna upasampanno yā āpattiyo pubbe chādesi tā āpattiyo pacchā chādeti;
pli-tv-kd13:29.2.13.eng: and then disrobes. Being reordained, he conceals those offenses he previously concealed,

pli-tv-kd13:29.2.14.pli: yā āpattiyo pubbe nacchādesi tā āpattiyo pacchā nacchādeti.
pli-tv-kd13:29.2.14.eng: but doesn’t conceal those offenses he previously didn’t conceal.

pli-tv-kd13:29.2.15.pli: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno purimasmiñca pacchimasmiñca āpattikkhandhe yathāpaṭicchanne parivāsaṃ datvā mānattaṃ dātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:29.2.15.eng: He should be given probation according to the length of the earlier and subsequent concealment of those offenses, and he should then be given the trial period.

pli-tv-kd13:29.2.16.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-kd13:29.2.16.eng: It may be that a monk commits a number of offenses entailing suspension,

pli-tv-kd13:29.2.18.pli: So vibbhamitvā puna upasampanno yā āpattiyo pubbe chādesi tā āpattiyo pacchā chādeti;
pli-tv-kd13:29.2.18.eng: and then disrobes. Being reordained, he conceals all of them.

pli-tv-kd13:30.1.1.eng: “It may be that a monk commits a number of unconcealed offenses entailing suspension and then becomes a novice monk …

pli-tv-kd13:30.1.7.pli: ekaccā āpattiyo jānāti, ekaccā āpattiyo na jānāti …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:30.1.7.eng: he’s aware of some of them, but not others …

pli-tv-kd13:30.1.8.pli: ekaccā āpattiyo sarati, ekaccā āpattiyo nassarati …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:30.1.8.eng: he remembers some of them, but not others …

pli-tv-kd13:30.1.9.pli: ekaccāsu āpattīsu nibbematiko, ekaccāsu āpattīsu vematiko.
pli-tv-kd13:30.1.9.eng: he’s sure of some of them, but unsure of others.

pli-tv-kd13:30.1.10.pli: Yāsu āpattīsu nibbematiko tā āpattiyo chādeti;
pli-tv-kd13:30.1.10.eng: He conceals the offenses he’s sure of,

pli-tv-kd13:30.1.11.pli: yāsu āpattīsu vematiko tā āpattiyo nacchādeti.
pli-tv-kd13:30.1.11.eng: but not those he’s unsure of.

pli-tv-kd13:30.1.12.eng: He then becomes overwhelmed by pain.

pli-tv-kd13:30.1.13.pli: So puna avedanāṭṭo hutvā yā āpattiyo pubbe nibbematiko chādesi tā āpattiyo pacchā nibbematiko nacchādeti;
pli-tv-kd13:30.1.13.eng: Having recovered and having become sure of all of them, he conceals none of them. …

pli-tv-kd13:30.1.14.pli: yā āpattiyo pubbe vematiko nacchādesi tā āpattiyo pacchā nibbematiko nacchādeti …pe…

pli-tv-kd13:30.1.15.pli: yā āpattiyo pubbe nibbematiko chādesi tā āpattiyo pacchā nibbematiko nacchādeti;
pli-tv-kd13:30.1.15.eng: having become sure of all of them, he doesn’t conceal those offenses he was previously sure of,

pli-tv-kd13:30.1.16.pli: yā āpattiyo pubbe vematiko nacchādesi tā āpattiyo pacchā nibbematiko chādeti …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:30.1.16.eng: but conceals those he was unsure of. …

pli-tv-kd13:30.1.17.pli: yā āpattiyo pubbe nibbematiko chādesi tā āpattiyo pacchā nibbematiko chādeti;
pli-tv-kd13:30.1.17.eng: having become sure of all of them, he conceals those offenses he was previously sure of,

pli-tv-kd13:30.1.18.pli: yā āpattiyo pubbe vematiko nacchādesi tā āpattiyo pacchā nibbematiko nacchādeti …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:30.1.18.eng: but not those he was unsure of. …

pli-tv-kd13:30.1.19.pli: yā āpattiyo pubbe nibbematiko chādesi tā āpattiyo pacchā nibbematiko chādeti;
pli-tv-kd13:30.1.19.eng: having become sure of all of them, he conceals all of them.

pli-tv-kd13:30.1.20.pli: yā āpattiyo pubbe vematiko nacchādesi tā āpattiyo pacchā nibbematiko chādeti.

pli-tv-kd13:30.1.21.pli: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno purimasmiñca pacchimasmiñca āpattikkhandhe yathāpaṭicchanne parivāsaṃ datvā mānattaṃ dātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:30.1.21.eng: He should be given probation according to the length of the earlier and subsequent concealment of those offenses, and he should then be given the trial period.”

pli-tv-kd13:30.1.22.eng: The group of one hundred on the trial period is finished.

pli-tv-kd13:31.1.0.eng: 6. The group of four hundred on simultaneous probation with sending back to the beginning

pli-tv-kd13:31.1.1.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto antarā sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjitvā appaṭicchādetvā vibbhamati.
pli-tv-kd13:31.1.1.eng: “It may be that a monk on probation commits a number of unconcealed offenses entailing suspension and then disrobes.

pli-tv-kd13:31.1.2.pli: So puna upasampanno tā āpattiyo nacchādeti.
pli-tv-kd13:31.1.2.eng: Being reordained, he doesn’t conceal those offenses.

pli-tv-kd13:31.1.3.eng: He’s to be sent back to the beginning.

pli-tv-kd13:31.3.49.eng: He remembers some of them, but not others.
